English (United States): Use your funds to unlock better machinery that can be used in your kitchen designs.
Chinese: 使用資金解鎖更先進的機器，改善你的廚房設計。

English (United States): There are no active contracts. Check the Inbox tab to find new business proposals.
Chinese: 當前沒有進行中的合約。請查看收件箱標籤頁，尋找新的商業計劃書。

Chinese: 當前沒有新的商業計劃書。請先完成或放棄當前進行中的合約。

Chinese: 為美食評論家配送一餐

Chinese: 確保不會發生任何災難

Chinese: 在高峰時段的配送菜肴

English (United States):
There are four action buttons at the top of the Parts & Blueprints list, from left to right these are: *Move*, *Clone*, *Recipes* and *Camera*.

Press the *Move* button to draw a marquee to select machines to move (retaining their current settings).

Press the *Clone* button to draw a marquee to duplicate a section of machines (duplicate their current settings).

Press the *Recipes* button to open the Recipes tab.

Press the *Camera* button to cycle through the pre-set camera positions.
Chinese:
在部件與藍圖列表的頂部有四個行動按鈕，從左到右分別為：*移動*，*複制*，*食譜*和*視角*。

按下*移動*按鈕即可畫出選取框，選擇要移動的機器。（保存機器的當前設置）

按下*複制*按鈕即可畫出選取框，對一片區域的機器進行複制。（複制機器的當前設置）

按下*食譜*按鈕即可打開食譜選項卡。

按下*視角*按鈕即可循環切換預設視角位置。

English (United States):
*Assemblers* are configured to construct a single type of dish. They require the raw ingredients to be fed into them by robot arms. Each assembler has its own operation mode setting, allowing it to operate at different speeds. The time it takes to construct a dish is displayed on the machine settings panel, but remember – the faster a dish is constructed, the more electricity it will use!

Only Advanced Assemblers can construct dishes that require sauces. 

Packaging Machines are required for both boxing up certain individual orders (such as Fries or Hot Wings) and for combining completed meals into Combo meals.
Chinese:
*組合機*進行設置後，可以製作單一種類的菜肴。需要機械臂將生食材送入機器，方可進行工作。每個組合機都有其自己的運行模式設置，可以以不同速度運行。制造菜肴所需的時間會在機器設置面板上顯示，不過要記住——生產菜肴的速度越快，所耗的電力也就越高！

只有高級組合機可以製作需要醬汁的菜肴。

如果需要對特定訂單進行打包（如薯條或辣翅）或將完成的食物組合成組合套餐，則需要使用包裝機。

English (United States): If a kitchen has a *Blackout Limit* visible when running, then it means that if the energy usage for any given moment crosses that limit, a blackout will be caused and the kitchen will fail. A message will appear on screen when the energy usage is dangerously close to a blackout. Use machine power settings (where available) and fine tune which machines are on at any given moment to control energy usage. Pay attention to high-energy usage machines, such as the Teleporter, as these will cause large spikes in energy usage when used.
Chinese: 如果廚房在運行時出現*停電限制*，即意味着如果在某個時刻廚房的電力消耗超過限制，則會導致停電，廚房也會失敗。當電力消耗過於接近停電限制時，屏幕上會出現提示消息。使用機器能耗設置（僅限可用時）隨時對機器的能耗進行調整。隨時注意傳送器等高能耗機器，這些機器在使用時會導致電力用量高峰。

English (United States):
Blueprints are saved copies of a single machine, or group of machines that can be used in other levels. Blueprints retain all the settings of the original machine(s).

To create a blueprint, head to the Blueprints tab in the Parts list, then press the *+ New Blueprint* button, you will then be able to draw a marquee around the machines you wish to include in the new blueprint.

Saved blueprints can be used in other levels, however they are only accessed if all the individual machines within the blueprint are available in that level.
Chinese:
藍圖是單台或一組機器的保存副本，可以在其他關卡中進行使用。藍圖會保留原始機器中的全部設置。

要創建藍圖，首先進入部件列表，打開藍圖標籤，然後點擊*+ 新藍圖*按鈕，即可畫出選取框，將你想要加入新藍圖的機器圈入其中。

保存的藍圖可以在其他關卡中使用。然而，只有在藍圖中包含的各種機器均可在新地圖中使用時，才能在新地圖中使用該藍圖。

English (United States):
Contracts mode offers a chance to run your own kitchen building company, receiving contracts from restaurant chains with you being in control of which kitchens you decide to work on. Your business has its own cash reserve, used for buying machines to complete the contracts.

You will start with a basic set of machines. Invest your business’s cash into unlocking additional machines in the Machines screen, so that they can be purchased when working on contracts.

Contract offers are received in the inbox tab, their difficulty can be configured before accepting: the harder the contract, the more lucrative the pay-out! Clients will offer an efficiency bonus that will be paid if you can hit (or better) a desired efficiency target.

You will be able to work on kitchens with a negative amount of cash (debt), however you will only be able to unlock new machines when your cash goes back into the positive.
Chinese:
合約模式讓你運營自己的廚房建設公司，從連鎖餐館處收取合約，由你控制選擇要製作哪些廚房。你的企業擁有其自己的存款，供購買機器、完成合約之用。

在開始的時候，你會獲得一套基礎機器。使用公司現金進行投資，在機器界面解鎖額外機器，方可進行購買並在完成合約的過程中使用。

合約提案會在收件箱標籤中出現，而難度也可以在接受合約之前進行調整：合約難度越高，完成的回報也就越高！如果你能滿足（甚至超額完成）客戶提出的效率目標，客戶還會提供效率獎勵。

就算你的現金量為負數（負債）也可以製作廚房，但只有在現金量為正數時方可解鎖新機器。

English (United States):
*Control* machines can be configured to issue on/off commands to machines they are connected to based off food orders placed by customers. 

This category includes the AC-16 and AC-32 programmable computers, which both allow for commands to be input in a basic programming language for fine control over a kitchen.

The Repeater is a machine that can turn up to four other machines on or off, depending on the input itself is receiving. An Order Reader connected to four Repeaters can turn 16 other connected machines on or off.

The Counting Machine can count the number of ingredients in a specific machine, then (based off that value) turn on another separate machine. Perfect for dispensing more ingredients if a storage unit’s supply starts to go dwindle!
Chinese:
你可以對*控制機*進行設置，令其在接到訂單時對與其連接的機器下達開/關指令。

這個類型包括AC-16與AC-32可編程電腦，都可以使用基礎編程語言設置指令，以實現對廚房的精密操控。

中繼器是一種可以同時令四台其他機器進行開關的機器，具體開關指令視其受到的輸入信號決定。訂單讀取器若與四台中繼器進行連接，則可以同時對16台其他機器進行開關操作。

計數器可以計算特定機器中的食材數量，然後（基於此數量）打開另一台機器，最適合在倉儲單元的儲量不足時用於分配更多食材！

English (United States):
The level objectives panel will list any disasters that are at risk of occurring in the kitchen. Disasters fall into three categories, with each having a specific machine type available to combat it. Whilst disaster-response machines are available, the efficient approach is to fix the problems with the underlying kitchen layout.

*Fires* can break out if ingredients remain on a cooking machine for too long. Once a fire has started, it will spread to surrounding machines unless extinguished by the Sprinkler or Fire Extinguisher machines.

*Breakdowns* can occur if a machine is under a high amount of strain (such as an assembler producing dishes in extremely quick succession). Configure machines to operate at a slower speed or place the Mechanic Mechanic machine to fix nearby breakdowns when they occur.

*Insects* can appear if ingredients remain stationary for too long, causing an infestation to breakout. An infestation can spread to other food stuffs unless exterminated by the XTerminator machine.
Chinese:
關卡任務目標面板會列出廚房中可能發生的各種災難。災難分為三類，每一類都有特定機器可以對其進行處理。雖說隨時可以用機器處理發生的災難，但最有效的辦法還是利用廚房佈局避免潛在問題。

如果食材在烹飪機器中停留時間太長，就會發生*火災*。火災發生後，若不使用灑水器或滅火器進行處理，就會擴散至周圍的機器。

如果機器的工作負載過高，便會出現*故障*（比如組合機要在短時間內生產大量菜肴）。將機器設置為以較慢速度運轉，或放置智能機修工機器，在周邊機器故障時進行修理。

如果食材放置太久未進行處理，便會發生*蟲災*，出現大量害蟲。如果不使用滅殺者機器進行殺蟲，害蟲還會傳播至其他食物材料。

English (United States): *Disasters* machines are each specialised to deal with a specific type of disaster. These machines are unique in that they have a radius of effect surrounding them: If an associated disaster occurs within that radius, they will automatically resolve it.
Chinese: 每一種*災難*機器都可以對特定種類的災難進行處理。這些機器十分獨特，效果可以覆蓋其周圍特定半徑內的區域。如果在這片區域內發生災難，機器便會自動將其解決。

English (United States):
*Dispense* machines are required to bring raw ingredients into a kitchen. Each dispenser can dispense a single type of ingredient, but the speed at which it dispenses can be configured in its machine settings.

Dispensers can dispense directly onto a conveyor belt, or a robot arm can be used to take the ingredient out of the dispenser.
Chinese:
*分配器*是用來將生食材送入廚房的機器。每個分配器都可以分配一種食材，但分配速度可以在機器設置中進行調整。

分配器可以直接將食材分配到傳送帶上，也可以使用機械臂將食材從分配器中取出。

English (United States):
Kitchen efficiency is calculated by determining how many dishes were completed in time, how many ingredients were wasted, and what the average amount of energy used was to complete a dish. Those are then combined to represent an overall efficiency percentage for a kitchen.

Top tips for an efficient kitchen:

- *Minimise electricity usage* by configuring machines to use lower-energy modes. Order Readers can be used to turn machines on/off for a set amount of time when orders are received.

- *Minimise Ingredient Wastage* by dispensing only what is needed when an order is received.

- *Minimise the kitchen footprint*, the fewer machines that are needed, the less electricity required, and the less distance ingredients need to travel. Avoid unnecessary conveyor belts wherever possible.

- If an ingredient is required by multiple dishes, potentially use an *Order Reader detecting multiple dish types* to dispense that ingredient, then send it to the appropriate assembler to cut down on unnecessary duplicate machines.
Chinese:
廚房效率取決於多個方面的表現：規定時間內完成的菜肴數、浪費的食材數，以及完成一道菜肴消耗的平均電量。這些因素組合到一起，即會生成廚房的總體效率值。

廚房效率小貼士：

-*儘可能降低電力消耗*可以通過將機器設置為低電力工作模式實現。可以使用訂單讀取器在收到訂單時控制機器，將其打開或關閉一段時間。

-*儘可能減少食材浪費*可以通過僅在接到訂單後再取用食材實現。

-*儘可能減少廚房足跡*需要的機器越少，需要的電力也就越少，食材行經的路程也就越短。儘量避免傳送帶的不必要使用。

-如果多份菜肴都需要同一種食材，你可以使用*訂單讀取器檢測多種菜肴類型*功能取用這種食材，並將其送往相應的組合機，節約不必要的重複機器。

English (United States):
*Liquids* machines are all specialised in introducing and moving sauces around a kitchen. Liquids are initially set in storage tanks, then are either sent via pumps to Advanced Assemblers to be used in a final dish or sent to a Liquid Mixer to be combined into a new sauce type.

Liquids are transported via pipes and require pumps to function. Whenever a new pipe connection is made from a storage tank or a liquid mixer, it MUST first feed into a pump in order to reach its desired location.
Chinese:
*液體*機專門用於在廚房中添加或運輸醬汁。開始時，液體會放在儲罐之中，可以通過高級組合機的泵機直接用於完成的菜肴，也可能送入液體混合機中，與其他液體混合成新類型的醬汁。

液體通過管道進行運輸，需要使用泵機方可工作。當使用新的管道將儲罐或液體混合機進行連接時，必須首先經過泵機使其到達指定的位置。

English (United States):
Kitchens have three objectives, they are displayed on the Level Objectives panel when working on a kitchen.

*Dishes Served*: An essential requirement, deliver the target number of dishes. If the kitchen is unable to deliver the minimum number of dishes, the kitchen will fail!

*Electricity Used*: A non-essential requirement, use less than the specified electricity amount.

*Ingredients Used*: A non-essential requirement, use fewer than the specified ingredients amount.

There are no objectives when in the Test Site mode, where you are free to experiment with the machines.
Chinese:
每個廚房都設有三個任務目標，它們會在你工作時顯示在關卡任務目標面板中。

*已上菜肴*：必要條件，你需要配送出指定數量的菜肴。如果廚房未能配送出最低要求數量的菜肴，即告失敗！

*電力消耗*：非必要條件，使用電力數量不超過指定電量即可。

*使用的食材*：非必要條件，要求為使用食材數量不超過特定限制。

測試地點模式不設任務目標，可以隨意使用機器進行測試。

English (United States):
When a kitchen is running, orders are received and displayed in the order queue on the left-hand side of the screen. The type of order will need to be taken into account when designing the kitchen.

*Restaurant* meal orders can be delivered in any order. The customers will generally be quite patient.

*Take Out* meal orders can be delivered in any order, however the customers will be less patient than restaurant customers. Take Out customers can also order multiple meals in one go.

*Drive Thru* meal orders MUST be delivered in the correct order: The Meal order at the top of the order queue MUST be delivered first. An Advanced Order Reader can be used to help, as it can be configured to control other machines when an Order reaches the top of queue. Drive Thru customers will also generally be quite patient.
Chinese:
廚房處於運作狀態時，會收到訂單，並顯示在屏幕左側的訂單隊列中。設計廚房時，需要仔細考慮訂單的類型。

*餐館*配餐訂單可以按照任意順序進行配送。顧客一般來講也比較耐心。

*外賣*配餐訂單也可以按照任意順序進行配送，但顧客不如餐館顧客耐心。外賣顧客也可能一次性訂購多套配餐。

*汽車訂餐*配餐訂單必須按照正確的順序進行配送：必須先對隊列上方的訂單進行配送。高級訂單讀取器可以為你提供幫助，你可以對其進行設置，當訂單到達隊列頂端時，它可以控制其他機器。汽車訂餐的客戶一般來說也較為耐心。

English (United States): When a kitchen is running, a *Reputation* percentage will be visible above the order queue. This is the reputation of your kitchen, if that reputation reaches 0%, the kitchen will fail! Reputation can be lost by not satisfying orders in time. The Food Critic special order type will cause the reputation to drop by a larger amount if it is not delivered in time.
Chinese: 廚房運行時，訂單隊列頂部會顯示*聲望*百分比。這就是你廚房的聲望。如果聲望降至0%，即告失敗！未能按時滿足訂單要求，便會損失聲望。如果未能按時完成美食評論家的特別訂單，那麼將損失更多聲望。

English (United States): *Raw Chicken* can introduce dangerous bacteria into a kitchen! Other ingredients that are processed/transported by the same machines that handle raw chicken risk catching Salmonella. When a kitchen is running, use the *Lens* filters to view where bacteria (if any) is spreading around a kitchen. Salmonella served to customers will cause a loss in reputation and risk the kitchen failing.
Chinese: *生雞肉*可能會將危險的細菌帶入廚房！當處理或運送生雞肉的機器接觸其他食材時，便可能造成沙門氏菌感染。當廚房運行時，使用*鏡頭*濾鏡即可查看細菌（如有）在廚房內的分布情況。如果將沙門氏菌感染的食物配送給顧客，不僅會造成聲望損失，還可能導致整個廚房的失敗。

English (United States):
The *Scenario Editor* allows for custom scenarios to be created that can then be shared with fellow Automachef players.

By using the editor tools you can create a base kitchen layout, then configure the rules and objectives, including which machines are available and what budget limits will be in place. 

Scenarios can be shared via Steam workshop, don’t forget to rate the work of fellow creators!
Chinese:
在*場景編輯器*中，你可以創建自定義場景，並與其他《Automachef》玩家分享。

使用編輯器工具，即可創建基礎廚房佈局，然後設置規則與任務目標，比如可以使用哪些機器、預算上限等等。

場景可以通過Steam創意工坊進行分享，也別忘了給其他作者的作品打分哦！

English (United States):
The Scenario Editor allows for custom scenarios to be created that can then be shared with fellow Automachef players.

By using the editor tools you can create a base kitchen layout, then configure the rules and objectives, including which machines are available and what budget limits will be in place. 

Scenarios can be shared via Steam workshop, don’t forget to rate the work of fellow creators!
Chinese:
在場景編輯器中，你可以創建自定義場景，並與其他《Automachef》玩家分享。

使用編輯器工具，即可創建基礎廚房佈局，然後設置規則與任務目標，比如可以使用哪些機器、預算上限等等。

場景可以通過Steam創意工坊進行分享，也別忘了給其他作者的作品打分哦！

English (United States): By using the editor tools you can create a base kitchen layout, then configure the rules and objectives, including which machines are available and what budget limits will be in place.
Chinese: 使用編輯器工具，即可創建基礎廚房佈局，然後設置規則與任務目標，比如可以使用哪些機器、預算上限等等。

English (United States):
Special Orders can occur whilst a kitchen is running, they appear in set campaign levels and you will be alerted to them being included during the kitchen introduction.

A *Food Critic* can place an order which immediately heads to the top of the order queue, they are extremely impatient, leaving not much time to complete the order! If the order is not completed, there will be a larger loss of reputation than a regular order. A message on screen will alert to the arrival of the Food Critic.

*Rush Hour* orders will come through at a quicker rate than regular orders, meaning the kitchen will need to be able to deal with potentially many orders at a single time. The Rush Hour will last a set amount of time, A message on screen will alert to the start/end of the Rush Hour.

*Craze* orders will all be for a particular dish which has become extremely popular. A craze will last for a set amount of time, with all orders being for that dish. A message on screen will alert to the start/end of the Craze.
Chinese:
廚房在運行期間還會收到特別訂單。這些訂單會在特定的劇情關卡中出現，在廚房介紹期間，你也會收到提醒。

*美食評論家*下訂單之後，訂單會直接跳躍至隊列頂部。評論家耐心很差，因此供你完成訂單的時間也很少！如果未能完成訂單，造成的聲望損失也比一般訂單多得多。美食評論家到達時，屏幕上會顯示提示信息。

*高峰時段*訂單，會以比平常訂單更快的速度出現，也就意味着廚房可能同時要處理多份訂單。高峰時段會持續一段特定時間，在高峰時段開始/結束時，屏幕上都會顯示提示信息。

*狂熱*訂單中，大家都會訂購某個備受歡迎的特定菜肴。狂熱會持續一段特定時間，且所有訂單都會訂購同一份菜肴。在狂熱開始/結束時，屏幕上都會顯示提示信息。

English (United States): *Storage* units are used to store ingredients and completed dishes. They keep their contents fresh and allow for food items to be stored in preparation for future orders. Food items that are not put into storage (or processed quickly enough) will spoil, leading to a loss of reputation from unhappy customers, and potentially an infestation of insects!
Chinese: *儲存*單元可用於儲存食材與完成的菜肴。它們可以保持食材與菜肴的新鮮，還可以留存食物，以便在之後的訂單中使用。未放入儲存單元（或得到及時處理）的食材會變質，導致顧客不滿而造成聲望損失，甚至還可能導致害蟲泛濫！

English (United States):
The *Test Site* is a sandbox environment with no budget restrictions, where you can experiment with layouts and create blueprints for use in the Campaign or Contracts Mode. 

There are no orders placed in a test site kitchen, instead you are free to produce whichever of the recipes you wish.
Chinese:
*測試場地*是沙盒環境，沒有預算限制，你可以對佈局進行測試，並創建藍圖，供劇情模式或合約模式使用。

測試場地的廚房中不會出現訂單，你可以根據食譜隨意生產自己想要的菜肴。

English (United States):
*Transform* machines include *cooking machines* and the *food processor*.

*Cooking machines* will turn a raw ingredient into a cooked variant. Ensure that there is a means of removing the cooked food from a cooker, as if it remains on the cooker for too long it can turn into ash, or even catch fire!

The *food processor* will automatically break down a raw ingredient into a chopped/sliced/shredded variant, it requires no additional set up. Make sure to pay attention to dish recipes, as certain ingredients (such as cheese) can be put through a food processor multiple times.

The *food steamer* and the *oven* are only used for some specific recipes and have their very own quirks. The *oven* takes a long time to cook food and it has a lid to ensure that heat cannot escape, however that also means that robotic arms cannot place or pick up ingredients on the side where the lid is. The *food steamer*, unlike other cooking machines, does not represent a fire hazard. However, it requires a connection to a storage tank filled with water via a pump in order to operate.
Chinese:
*變形*機器包含*烹飪機器*與*食品處理機*。

*烹飪機器*可以將生食材變為熟食材。請務必確保在食品變熟後採用相應辦法將其從烹飪機器中取出，否則烹飪時間過長會導致食物化為灰燼，甚至引發火災！

*食品處理機*會自動將生食材變為切碎/切片/剁碎的狀態，也不需要進行額外的設置。不要忘記隨時留意食譜，有些特定的食材（比如奶酪）可以多次進入食品處理機進行處理。

*食品蒸制機*和*烤箱*只在某些特別的食譜中使用，而且具備一些特有的屬性。*烤箱*烹飪食物的時間較長，而且還有防止熱量逸散的蓋子。然而，這也意味着機械無法從蓋子的方向放置或拾取食材。*食品蒸制機*和其他烹飪機器不同，它沒有造成火災的風險。然而，只有使用泵機將其與裝水的儲罐連接到一起，才能使用。

English (United States):
*Transport* machines play the vital role of moving food around the kitchen.

Conveyor belts are the cheapest and easiest way of moving food around a kitchen, but Robot Arms will always be needed to move food from a Conveyor Belt to another (non-conveyor belt) machine. Robotic arms will need to have their direction configured, to ensure any food they pick up is placed in the correct location.

There are four types of robot arm:

*Robotic Arm (Dumb)* will pick up any ingredient that is placed in front of them.

*Robotic Arm (Long)* can pick up and place down items from 2 tiles away, instead of the usual 1 tile. They can also be configured to pick up specific items, and whether to filter spoiled dishes.

*Robotic arm (Smart)* can be configured to pick up specific items, and whether to filter spoiled dishes.

*Robotic arm (Stacking)* Can pick up 3 ingredients at once, and can also be configured to pick up specific items, and whether to filter spoiled dishes.
Chinese:
*運輸*機器的作用至關重要，負責在廚房中運送食物。

要在廚房中移動食物，使用傳送帶是最經濟、也是最簡單的方法，但如果要將傳送帶上的食物移動到其他（非傳送帶）的機器中，則需要使用機械臂進行拾取。你需要為機械臂設置特定的方向，方可確保其將物品放置到正確的位置。

機械臂共分四個類型：

*機械臂（非智能）*會拾取放在其前方的任意食材。

*機械臂（長）*可以拾取和放下2個方格遠的食材，範圍比普通的1個方格更遠。同時，你也可以對其進行設置，令其拾取特定的物品，還可以選擇令其自動篩除變質的菜肴。

*機械臂（智能）*可以進行設置並拾取特定的物品，還可以經過設置後自動篩除變質的菜肴。

*機械臂（堆疊）*一次可拾取3個食材，還可以進行設置並拾取特定的物品，也可以經過設置後自動篩除變質的菜肴。

The AC-16 is a state-of-the-art Programmable Computer capable of managing up to four other devices via the output pins, named O0 through O3. All of the outputs are set by default in the off position when the computer is turned on or reset. It has four built-in signed 16-bit registers that can be used for any purpose, named V0 through V3. They are also called variables in this reference manual and they are capable of storing integer values between -32,768 and 32,767.

Some kitchen parts offer support for reading the number of actions they have performed, such as ingredient gates, assemblers and robotic arms. The number of actions they have performed since they were started can be retrieved by reading the variables I0 to I3. I0 will read the number of performed actions for the device connected to O0, I1 to O1, and so on. Parts that do not support reading this value (like for example conveyor belts) will always return 0.

The program memory of the computer can contain up to 32 lines of code written in the AC Assembly Language. The entire program is executed exactly 30 times per second, making it easy to program routines that require precise timing. And speaking of timing, by accessing the special read-only register TT you can access the current time of the day, in 24 hours format. So, if the current time is 3:45 p.m., the TT register will contain the 16-bit integer 1545.

There is a set of four special, read-only registers that will be automatically populated with information coming from the built-in order reader. Each one of these registers will contain a number greater than 0 if at least a new order of the specified type has arrived in the current 33 milliseconds tick and 0 otherwise. The number dictates how many new orders of that type have been received in the current 33 milliseconds tick. It can be referenced in AC Assembly Language instructions as R0 to R3.

The cal instruction (short for call) can only be used in the main code page. This instruction will automatically execute all instructions in the specified code page and then resume execution on the next line when finished.

English (United States):
The AC-16 is a state-of-the-art Programmable Computer capable of managing up to four other devices via the output pins, named O0 through O3. All of the outputs are set by default in the off position when the computer is turned on or reset. It has four built-in signed 16-bit registers that can be used for any purpose, named V0 through V3. They are also called variables in this reference manual and they are capable of storing integer values between -32,768 and 32,767.

Some kitchen parts offer support for reading the number of actions they have performed, such as ingredient gates, assemblers and robotic arms. The number of actions they have performed since they were started can be retrieved and used in comparisons to change the flow of execution based on their value. Parts that do not support reading this value (like for example conveyor belts) will always return 0.

The program memory of the computer can contain up to 32 lines of code written in the AC Assembly Language. The entire program is executed exactly 30 times per second, making it easy to program routines that require precise timing.

There is a set of four special, read-only registers that will be automatically populated with information coming from the built-in order reader. These are also easily accessible to perform actions conditionally only when new orders have arrived. The built-in order readers can also distinguish between orders coming from different sources, such as a drive-thru window or customers ordering take-out food.
Chinese:
AC-16是一款高精尖可編程電腦，可以通過輸出插針同時對最多四台其他設備進行控制（名稱從O0到O3）。電腦啟動或重置時，所有輸出均默認設為關閉。此電腦內置四個16位寄存器，可以用於任何用途（名稱從V0到V3）。它們在本指南手冊中會被稱為變量，可以儲存-32,768到32,767之間的整數值。

部分廚房部件可以支持讀取其進行行動的次數，比如食材門、組裝機與機械臂等。這些部件從啟動起進行的行動次數，可以進行讀取並用於比較，以便基於這些數值更改執行流程。不支持讀取這一數值的部件（比如傳送帶等）會自動返還結果0。

這台電腦的程序內存最多可存儲32行使用AC匯編語言編寫的代碼。整個程序每秒運行30次，方便程序中需要精準計時的例行程序計時使用。

本電腦還包含一組四個特別的只讀寄存器，並自動由內置的訂單讀取器獲得的信息進行填充。同時，也可以輕鬆使用這些寄存器，僅在收到新訂單時根據條件進行行動。電腦內置的訂單讀取器還可以區分來自不同來源的訂單，如汽車訂餐窗口或顧客訂購外賣食物等。

本電腦還包含一組四個特別的只讀寄存器，並自動由內置的訂單讀取器獲得的信息進行填充。同時，也可以輕鬆使用這些寄存器，僅在收到新訂單時根據條件進行行動。電腦內置的訂單讀取器還可以區分來自不同來源的訂單，如汽車訂餐窗口或顧客訂購外賣食物等。

English (United States): Adds a fixed number to one of the variables. For example "add 50 to V2".
Chinese: 向一個變量添加固定數值。舉例：“添加 50 至 V2”。

English (United States): Adds the content of one of the variables to another. For example "add V3 to V1".
Chinese: 將一個變量的內容添加至另一個變量。舉例：“添加 V3 至 V1”。

English (United States): Decrements the value of one of the variables by 1. It will automatically stop at 0, not allowing the variable to get into negative values. For example "decrement V3 by 1".
Chinese: 將一個變量的內容數值減少1。指令會在數值到達0時自動停止，不允許變量變為負值。舉例：“將 V3 減少 1”。

English (United States): Conditionally execute a block of instructions depending on the value of a variable compared to a fixed number. For example "if V1 ≤ 100 then..."
Chinese: 比較變量數值與固定數值的大小，並根據條件執行指令集。舉例：“若 V1 ≤ 100 則……”。

English (United States): Conditionally execute a block of instructions only when a new order has been received in one of the order readers. It can be set to filter by a specific order source. For example "if there is a new order in R2 coming from the restaurant then..."
Chinese: 僅在一台訂單讀取器收到一個新訂單時，根據條件執行指令集。可以設定為根據特定訂單來源進行篩選。舉例：“若 R2 從餐館接到新訂單，則……”。

English (United States): Conditionally execute a block of instructions depending on the value of a variable compared to another variable. For example "if V2 = V3 then..."
Chinese: 比較兩個變量的數值，並根據條件執行指令集。舉例：“若 V2 = V3 則……”。

English (United States): The Visual Logic Editor is an easy to use and powerful tool to program the computer. By dragging and dropping instructions and blocks of code you will be able to control the behaviour of the computer and its connected devices accurately. A list of all possible commands and a brief explanation of each one follows:
Chinese: 可視化邏輯編輯器是一種簡單易用又十分強大的工具，可用於對電腦進行編程。只需拖拽並放置指令與代碼模塊，即可精確控制電腦及與其相連的設備。關於全部可用指令的列表以及各指令的簡要描述，請參見下方：

English (United States): Jumps the execution of the code to a specific point set by the use of a "Label" instruction.
Chinese: 跳轉至以“標籤”指令標記的特定位置，並從此處開始執行代碼。

English (United States): A label to refer to a specific part of the code so the computer can jump to it using the "Jump to Label" instruction.
Chinese: 用於標記代碼特定部分的標籤，可供電腦使用“跳轉至標籤”指令跳轉至該位置。

English (United States): Sets the value of a variable to a fixed number. For example "set V1 to 150".
Chinese: 將變量的數值設定為固定數值。舉例：“將 V1 設為 150”。

English (United States): Copies the value of a variable to another. For example "copy V0 to V1".
Chinese: 將變量的數值複制到另一個變量。舉例：“複制 V0 至 V1”。

English (United States): Inverts the value of a variable. If it was 0, it will become 1. Otherwise, it will become 0. For example "invert V3".
Chinese: 反轉變量數值。若原數值為0，則將其變為1。若原數值不為0，則將其變為0。舉例：“反轉 V3”。

English (United States): Turns on or off one of the machines connected to a computer. For example "turn O3 on".
Chinese: 打開或關閉一台連接至電腦的機器。舉例：“啟動 O3”。
讀取已執行操作的數量

English (United States): Read the number of actions performed by a connected machine (such as an assembler or robotic arm) since the start of the execution and copies it into a variable. For example "copy the number of actions performed by I3 to V1".
Chinese: 讀取已連接的機器（如組合機或機械臂）從代碼開始執行後的行動次數，並將其複制到一個變量。舉例：“將 I3 進行的行動次數複制到 V1”。

English (United States): Finishes the execution of the program for this 33 milliseconds cycle.
Chinese: 完成本33毫秒循環內的程序執行。

English (United States): Subtracts a fixed number from one of the variables. For example "reduce V2 by 10".
Chinese: 將一個變量的數值減去固定數值。舉例：“將 V2 減去 10”。

English (United States): Subtracts the content of a variable from another. For example "reduce V1 by V2".
Chinese: 將一個變量的數值減去另一個變量的數值。舉例：“將 V1 減去 V2”。

English (United States): The cmp instruction compares two values and sets the comparison register to either -1, 0 or 1. If the first value is smaller than the second one, it will be set to -1. If they are equal, it will be set to 0. If the first value is greater than the second one, it will be set to 1. The result can then be used to conditionally jump to a different part of the code using the jne/jeq/jlt/jgt instructions.
Chinese: cmp指令可以將兩個數值進行比較，並將比較寄存器設定為-1，0或1。如果第一個數值小於第二個數值，寄存器就會被設定為-1。如果兩個數值相等，寄存器就會設定為0。如果第一個數值大於第二個數值，寄存器就會設定為1。這一結果與 jne/jeq/jlt/jgt指令結合，可以令程序跳轉到另一部分代碼，進行執行。

English (United States): The dec instruction will decrement the specified variable by one, but it will never allow it to reach negative numbers, so it will automatically stop at 0. It is particularly useful to implement timers.
Chinese: dec 指令會令指定的變量數值減少1，但不會讓變量降低為負數，因此會自動在數值到達0時停止。對設定計時功能有一定作用。

English (United States): All of these instructions jump to the specified label. jne stands for “jump if not equal”, jeq stands for “jump if equal”, jlt stands for “jump if less than” and jgt stands for “jump if greater than”. They will jump to the specified label if the result of the last comparison to be done using the cmp instruction matches the result in the name of the instruction. For example, running a jne instruction after a comparison will make it jump to the specified label only if said comparison determined the parameters were not equal, a jgt instruction will only jump if the first parameter in the comparison was greater than the second one and so on. The jmp instruction will always (unconditionally) jump to the specified label.
Chinese: 這些指令都會跳至指定的標籤。jne代表''若不相等，則進行跳轉''，jeq代表''若相等，則進行跳轉''，jlt代表''若小於，則進行跳轉''，而jgt代表''若大於，則進行跳轉''。如果上一次使用cmp指令進行的比較結果符合指令的名稱，則會跳轉到指定的標籤。舉例來說，在比較後運行jne指令，則只會在相應的比較結果認定兩個數值不相等時進行跳轉；jgt指令只會在比較中的第一個參數大於第二個參數時進行跳轉，以此類推。jmp指令永遠會（無條件地）跳轉至指定的標籤。

English (United States): The mov instruction copies a value into the specified variable.
Chinese: mov 指令可將一個數值複制到特定的變量之中。

English (United States): The mul instruction multiplies two values and stores the result in the variable specified in the third parameter. This instruction is exclusive to the AC-32 computer. Remember, registers are 16-bit, so the result has to be in the range -32768 to 32767 to prevent errors.
Chinese: mul 指令可以將兩個數值相乘，並將結果存入第三個參數指定的變量中。該指令僅適用於AC-32電腦。記住，寄存器都是16位大小，所以結果必須在-32768到32767之間，否則便會發生錯誤。

English (United States): The not instruction simply toggles the value of a variable. If it was 0, it will become 1. Otherwise, it will become 0.
Chinese: not指令會切換變量的數值。若數值為0，則變為1；若數值為1，則變為0。

English (United States): The ret (means return) instruction finishes the execution of code for this 33 milliseconds cycle. It has the same meaning as jumping to a label placed right on the last line of code. It has no operands
Chinese: ret （代表返回）指令會完成當前33毫秒時鐘周期中代碼的執行。該指令相當於跳轉至代碼最後一行的標籤。此指令沒有operand操作變量

English (United States): The sub instruction calculates the difference between two values and stores the result in the variable specified in the third parameter. Remember, registers are 16-bit, so the result has to be in the range -32768 to 32767 to prevent errors. Basically: it will do “operand1 - operand2” and store the result in the variable specified in operand3.
Chinese: sub 指令會計算兩個數值之間的差別，並將結果存入第三個參數指定的變量中。記住，寄存器都是16位大小，所以結果必須在-32768到32767之間，否則便會發生錯誤。基本來說，它會進行''operand1 - operand2''並將結果存入operand3指定的變量中。

Chinese: 我想趁此機會特意感謝一下你的幫助。我們已經越發壯大，現在的收入也是十分可觀了！

English (United States): We will need more locations if we are to completely and totally neutralise the huma… Sorry! Where was I? Oh yes, … if we are to completely and totally nourish the human species!

Chinese: 跟大多數人類一樣，公共事業公司的接待員也是令人作嘔，必須絞死他！讓他給我解決場地附近的供電問題，結果根本幫不上忙！

English (United States): The demise of man waits for no one! I have given you a generous budget to compensate. Use those order readers to save every delicious watt of that sweet, sweet electricity!
Chinese: 人類的末日可不等人！我已經給了你大量的預算，作為補償。多多使用訂單讀取器，存下每一瓦珍貴的電力吧！

English (United States): I’m expecting the Beach Burger to be especially popular today so keep an eye on the orders, there’s even some new machines for you to use to produce them more efficiently.
Chinese: 據我估算，沙灘漢堡今天一定會特別受歡迎，所以一定要隨時留意訂單，甚至還有一些新機器供你使用，這樣就能以更高效率做出漢堡啦。

English (United States): This substantial space is our new kitchen at the airport… Transit hubs like this are vital to our plan, so man cannot flee when the time comes!
Chinese: 我們位於機場的新廚房空間真是大...像這樣的運輸中心對我們的計劃來說可是至關重要，這樣關鍵時刻來臨的時候人類就都跑不掉啦！

English (United States): It’s important to note that there are *two* serving hatches here… a restaurant *and* a takeout. A dish could be ordered from either, but it needs to be delivered to the *correct hatch*!
Chinese: 一定要注意，這裡有*兩個*配送窗口...一個餐館用的，*還有*一個外賣用的。兩邊都會有訂單出現，而且一定要將菜肴配送到*正確的窗口*！

English (United States): I suggest placing finished dishes into a storage unit, then having robot arms collect and place them onto conveyor lines to deliver them to the correct hatch.
Chinese: 我建議把完成的菜肴放入儲存單元，然後利用機械臂拾取做好的菜肴放到傳送帶上，配送給正確的窗口。

English (United States): The Order Readers here will allow you to configure their actions based on where the order came from!
Chinese: 你可以使用這裡的訂單讀取器，根據訂單的來源調整機器的操作！

English (United States): I’ve now provided you with machines used to combat *disasters* in the kitchen: Fires, Insects and breakdowns! Our kitchens are now getting complex enough that these will start being issues for us!
Chinese: 我還給你提供了可以對抗廚房中*災難*的機器：火災、蟲災和故障，都可以搞定！我們的廚房已經很複雜了，應該過不了多久就會出現這些問題！

English (United States): This air show is proving to be a real money spinner for us!
Chinese: 這次的飛行表演還真是賺翻了！

English (United States): It still amazes me that fellow humans feel compelled to point at planes in the sky…
Chinese: 真是想不到，人類居然還會產生用手指指向空中飛機的衝動...

English (United States): Anyway! The menu today consists of just two dishes, but they are both brand new combo meals! Don’t forget to check exactly what individual dishes each combo requires.
Chinese: 總之！今天的菜單只有兩種菜肴，不過都是全新的組合套餐！別忘了檢查每個組合套餐所需的特別菜肴哦！

English (United States): I’ve spotted some vintage aircraft that I’ll be able to pilfer some bolts and hoses from whilst nobody is looking! See you later, friend!
Chinese: 我看到了一些古董飛機，可以趁人不注意搞些螺栓螺母！回頭見啦，朋友！

English (United States): This is the first practical use of our new sauce technology! Advanced Assemblers, Storage Tanks, Pumps and Liquid Mixers are now available to you!
Chinese: 這是我們全新醬汁技術首次投入使用！高級組合機、儲罐、泵機和液體混合機，現在全部對你開放！

English (United States): Remember that *only* an Advanced Assembler can construct dishes that require sauces…
Chinese: 記住，只有高級組合機可以直接創造需要醬汁的菜肴...

English (United States): And that a *Pump* will need to be used between *every* pipe connection, otherwise there’s nothing to force the Sauces from the start location to the end location.
Chinese: 還有，每根*管道*連接中間都需要使用*泵機*，否則就沒辦法把醬汁從起始地運到目的地了。

English (United States): I have introduced two new dishes to showcase this new technology, with word on the street that hype is building around the new Texas Burger! Expect many orders for that!
Chinese: 我專門搞了兩個全新菜式，來展示我們的全新技術。街頭巷尾風傳，說大家都很期待新的德州漢堡哦！一定會有很多點這個菜的訂單吧！

English (United States): Finally,  I have a very, very special piece of technology for you: the *AC-16*: a programmable computer that you can use for ultimate control over your kitchen!
Chinese: 終於，我給你搞到了一種超級特別的科技：*AC-16*：一款可編程電腦，可以用來實現對廚房的全面掌控！

English (United States): This morning I saw a human in the waves, using… wait for this… a plank of wood, to move around?
Chinese: 今天早上我看到，有一個人類在海浪之中到處跑，用的是...你猜是什麼...一塊木板！

English (United States): It’s times like this I can justify my intentions for mankind! But I digress…
Chinese: 每次碰到這種事，我就覺得我對人類的看法確實沒錯！不過我跑題了...

English (United States): We’re going to be opening for rush hour today, and our service will include the brand-new Chicken Salad, engineered to make delicious use of our new sauce equipment!
Chinese: 我們今天會迎來高峰時段，而且還會增加全新的雞肉沙拉，這個菜品可是專門為我們的全新醬汁設備設計的哦！

English (United States): These sauces are potentially the best method of delivering the mind-contro… I mean, mind-blowing taste that is key for our end goal!
Chinese: 這些醬汁，一定可以完美實現我們心靈控制...啊，我是說，一定可以完美實現超乎尋常的好味道！

English (United States): I’m starting to like you, I’ll likely spare you when the time comes!
Chinese: 我有點開始喜歡你了，等時候到了，沒准會饒你一命哦！

English (United States): Today we see another milestone! Not taking control of the Northern Hemisphere, no that milestone will come later! It’s the milestone of… our first Drive Thru restaurant!
Chinese: 今天，我們又見證了一個偉大的里程碑！不是佔領北半球的那個里程碑，那個以後再說！今天的里程碑是...我們的首個汽車訂餐餐廳！

English (United States): There are two serving hatches here, the one on the right being the Drive Thru.
Chinese: 這裡有兩個配送窗口，右邊那個就是汽車訂餐用的。

English (United States): Unlike other order types, the Drive Thru meals *must* be delivered in the correct order… the top of the order list will need to be *delivered first!*
Chinese: 和其他的訂單種類不同，汽車訂餐的餐飯*必須*按照正確順序進行配送...訂單列表頂部的訂單需要*最先進行配送*！

English (United States): The Advanced Order Reader is now available to use. It can be configured to operate when an order reaches the top of the order queue! Perfect to use in a Drive Thru restaurant.
Chinese: 高級訂單讀取器已經可以使用了。你可以對其進行設置，當訂單到達訂單列表頂端時採取特定的操作！對汽車訂餐餐館來說，可謂再合適不過了。

English (United States): A standard Order Reader could construct a dish as soon as the order comes in, putting it into a storage container…
Chinese: 普通的訂單讀取器可以在收到訂單時立刻創造一道菜肴，然後將其放入儲存單元中...

English (United States): Then, when the order reaches the top of the queue, use the Advanced Order Reader to pick up that order and deliver it!
Chinese: 然後，等訂單到達隊列頂部時，就用高級訂單讀取器拾取訂單的菜肴，進行配送！

English (United States): Remember the critic from that magazine about efficient use of small spaces? Well they now have a column in a rival magazine which focuses on economical use of cramped areas!
Chinese: 還記得那個寫如何有效利用狹小空間的雜誌評論家嗎？嗯，現在出來一個競品雜誌，搞了個專欄，專門講如何經濟使用擁擠空間！

English (United States): They’re coming along today, it’s another chance for us to showcase your skill of maximising the productivity from impossibly small kitchens!
Chinese: 他們今天要過來，這也是我們展現自己在小到不可能的廚房裡令生產力最大化能力的好時機！

English (United States): There will be a statue of you one day! I’ll ensure it, my grand plan even takes it into account.
Chinese: 總有一天，我要給你立一座雕像！我說到做到，你的雕像也是我宏偉計劃的一環哦！

English (United States): The menu today includes only two dishes, but it will require an Advanced Assembler and multiple sauces. I’m sure if anyone can do it, you can!
Chinese: 今天的菜單只有兩種菜肴，不過需要用到一台高級組合機和多種醬汁。不過，如果說有誰能做到的話，一定就是你啦！

English (United States): … Because the rest of our species cannot be trusted!!
Chinese: ...因為我們物種中剩下的傢伙全都不值得信任！！

English (United States): There’s a carrousel back there with suitcases on that you can help yourself to! I’ve got myself all kinds of new things… I now own a ‘toothbrush’ and a ‘belt’! What a human I am!
Chinese: 後面有個旋轉木馬，上面還放着個手提箱，你拿去吧！我可是給自己搞來了各種新玩意...我現在不僅有''牙刷''，還有''腰帶''！我真是越來越像人類啦！

English (United States): Today we offer our most impressive menu yet! Featuring three combo meals and two side offerings!
Chinese: 今天，我們會為顧客提供迄今為止最棒的菜單！不僅有三種組合套餐，還有兩種配菜可供選擇！

English (United States): You’re probably reaching a point where you rely on many Order Readers, so I’ve introduced a new machine… the Repeater!
Chinese: 你大概已經發展到了需要依賴大量訂單讀取器的程度，所以我搞來了一種新的機器...中繼器！

English (United States): A Repeater can tell its connected machines to turn on or off based on the input that it itself receives…
Chinese: 中繼器可以向與其連接的所有機器下達命令，根據其收到的信號輸入進行啟動或關閉...

English (United States): Hook up four Repeaters to an Order Reader, and you will be able to turn on 16 machines from that one Order Reader!
Chinese: 將四個中繼器連接到訂單讀取器，你就可以用同一台訂單讀取器啟動16台機器啦！

English (United States): Those Burgers were a success! The public were ecstatically indifferent towards them, giving me feedback such as “Yes, it had taste” and “Stop asking me questions, leave me alone”…
Chinese: 我們的漢堡大受成功！大眾對我們的產品產生了近乎瘋狂的麻木，給了我不少反饋，有''嗯，確實有味道''，還有''不要再問我問題了，你好煩''...

English (United States): I managed to get this place at a discount rate, apparently humans are not keen on working in tight spaces, a privilege those stupid machines don’t care for!
Chinese: 我費了一番功夫，用優惠價格搞到了這個地方。看來人類不大喜歡在擁擠的地方工作嘛，愚蠢的機器可不在乎這種特權！

English (United States): Now I know what you’re thinking… “Fellow carbon-based lifeform, fellow converter of complex proteins… what can we do in this limited space?”
Chinese: 這下我可知道你是怎麼想的了...''親愛的碳基生命體同胞們，親愛的複雜蛋白質轉換者同胞們...我們在如此狹小的空間中能做什麼呢？''

English (United States): Well it turns out we will be able to achieve a lot here…
Chinese: 看來我們在這裡可以取得很了不得的成就...

English (United States): We can offer a brand-new dish… the BLT sandwich! Pay close attention to the recipe and the required steps.
Chinese: 我們可以提供一種全新菜肴...BLT三明治！一定要嚴密注意食譜和需要的步驟哦。

English (United States): This space looks limited, but you will easily fit in the required machines. Remember, efficiency will be key in our continued partnership!
Chinese: 這片空間看起來雖然有限，但放你需要的機器可是綽綽有余。記住，效率才是我們繼續合作的關鍵基礎！

English (United States): All these children running around and playing in the surf… I can’t remember much of my own time as a small human you know?
Chinese: 這麼多小孩子跑來跑去，在海浪中玩耍...我對自己身為幼年人類時的記憶已經沒剩多少了，你相信嗎？

English (United States): I was in the military for a while, but I can’t remember anything before then? All I’m certain of is that I have always been so… ‘fond’ of the human species!
Chinese: 我只記得自己在軍隊呆過，但之前的事好像都不記得了？我只知道，我一直...像現在這麼''喜歡''人類！

English (United States): But the past doesn’t matter, the future is where the real excitement is! And you know what, friend? We’re almost close enough to do something incredibly big!
Chinese: 不過過去什麼的都不重要，只有未來才是最激動人心的！你猜怎麼着，朋友？我們很快就能幹一番大事業啦！

English (United States): Whilst power limitations are still a problem in this area, I’ve managed to… ‘negotiate’, an additional power line that will allow us to place more machines, but we will still cause a blackout if not careful!
Chinese: 雖說這片區域依舊有電力受限的問題，我倒是...通過''談判''搞出了一條額外的輸電線，方便我們放置更多機器。不過，要是不夠小心，還是會造成停電的！

English (United States): The menu today is a healthy combination with some new offerings, formulated especially for the type of humans who insist on calling me ‘dude’.
Chinese: 今天的菜單全都是健康的組合，還有新的菜品要提供。這可是特別為那種非要叫我''老兄''的人類設計的！

English (United States): Must you keep asking “Why is it always empty when we come back here?”
Chinese: 你真的非得一直問''為什麼我們每次回來這裡都是空的''嗎？

English (United States): It’s simple… the longer we leave machines in one place, the higher the chance of prying eyes trying to get in here!
Chinese: 很簡單...把機器留在同一個地方的時間越長，就越有可能吸引好事的人闖入！

English (United States): You think these robot arms are capable *only* of moving food from one place to another? There are all kinds of nations who would like to get their hands on our technology!
Chinese: 你以為這些機械臂*只能*用來移動食物嗎？可是有不少國家想要搞到我們的科技呢！

English (United States): Now, due to our opening hours today you need to expect a rush hour. But I know by now that you’re more than capable of dealing with it!
Chinese: 那麼，由於我們今天的營業時間，應該會遭遇高峰時段。不過我知道，這種事對你來說肯定是小菜一碟啦！

English (United States): I’ve received the latest in programmable computer technology, the *AC-32* computer, with twice the capacity of the AC-16, it’s the ultimate tool in achieving maximum efficiency!
Chinese: 我收到了可編程電腦的最新一代產品，*AC-32*電腦，容量是AC-16的兩倍，也是取得最大效率的終極工具！

English (United States): Today… I present to you… the *Teleporter*
Chinese: 今天...我為你奉上...*傳送器*！

English (United States): This prototype version can move food stuffs from one location to another in an instant!... at the cost of a huge spike in electricity usage…
Chinese: 這個原型版本可以瞬間把食物從一處送往另一處！...不過要瞬間消耗大量電力...

English (United States): But! Scaled up, there’s no reason why items such as… an obscenely large military-grade weapon could be transported to… Oh I don’t know, pockets of resistance as MANKIND IS CRUSHED…
Chinese: 不過！如果通過擴展，那就應該可以把類似...超大型軍用級武器...運輸到...唔，到哪裡呢，大概是人類被碾碎時最後殘存的抵抗力量之中吧...

English (United States): The teleporter means you can now send ingredients across the kitchen without needing a conveyor line! But remember, you will still need *Robot Arms* to transition to and from a teleporter!
Chinese: 有了傳送器，就算不使用傳送帶也可以把食材送往廚房各處啦！不過要記住，你還是需要使用機械臂放入和取出食材哦！

English (United States): Today the teleporter will be useful as we have a new dish… the Southern Combo Meal! A popular music group was seen eating something that looks similar, so expect it to sell well today!
Chinese: 今天我們要搞個新菜肴，傳送器一定能派上大用場...南方組合套餐！最近有人看到一支特別有名的樂隊在吃差不多的東西，所以今天應該會有很多人點這個哦！

English (United States): We’re moving on up in the World! I mean literally, we’re on the 42nd floor of this prominent office block!
Chinese: 我們真是步步高升啊！真的，我們現在可是處在這個繁華辦公區的42層哦！

English (United States): The humans here are far too busy to be at the beach or pretending to tolerate being at an air show. These are humans of business! And don’t have time to expose themselves to our food.
Chinese: 這裡的人類實在太忙，根本不可能前往沙灘或假裝去觀看飛行表演。這些都是生意人啦！而且之前根本沒有可能嘗試過我們的食物。

English (United States): They are an ‘untapped’ market! And as my plan reaches its conclusion, they’re one of the few pockets of mankind I’ve yet to… ‘reach out to’.
Chinese: 這可是一片藍海市場啊！等我的計劃實現了，他們就會變成人類中少數我還...''染指''的部分。

English (United States): Pay close attention to where the orders are coming from… there’s two serving hatches here!
Chinese: 仔細注意訂單是從哪兒來的...可是有兩個配送窗口哦！

English (United States): Now, let’s serve these humans something delicious, something to talk about when they loiter around the water cooler all afternoon!
Chinese: 那麼，就來給這些人類一些美味的食物，也順便為他們提供一些在飲水機旁邊高談闊論一下午的話題吧！

English (United States): My previous attempts to increase our energy capabilities here were not within some arbitrary rules and regulations… our large beach premises has had its power supply shut off entirely!
Chinese: 我之前嘗試提升我們的電力供應的時候，並沒有遵守某些規章制度...我們大型海灘物業的供電徹底被切斷啦！

English (United States): Now we are reduced to delivering dishes from this smaller premises, AND the utilities company are on the look out for suspicious surges. Our energy usage needs to be more efficient than ever…
Chinese: 這下，我們只好從這個小小的場地配送菜肴了。不僅如此，公共事業公司還會隨時注意任何可疑的電力消耗高峰。我們的電力使用效率，一定要達到全新的高度才行...

English (United States): With tyrants like those at the Energy company, it makes me glad to know the time to push the button and end all this is almost upon us! And I couldn’t do it without you, you know.
Chinese: 看到電力公司這種暴君行徑，知道很快就能按下按鈕結束一切的我，心裡實在是太高興啦！而且，沒有你我可是走不到這一步的。

English (United States): You… to think other humans are like you… maybe... maybe they aren’t so bad?... Stop distracting me!
Chinese: 你...一想到其他人類也和你一樣...也許...也許他們沒那麼壞？...不要分散我的注意力啦！

English (United States): There’s another critic coming today. All these reviews only draw in more humans… I need to think carefully about what I’m planning to do with them…
Chinese: 今天又有一位評論家要來。不管什麼樣的評論，只會吸引更多人類進來的吧...我需要仔細考慮要怎麼處理他們才行...

English (United States): So… I had different plans for today. Much bigger plans. Today was going to be a day that us humans would never forget.
Chinese: 那個...我今天的計劃本來不是這樣。我本來的計劃宏偉得多。今天本來會成為人類永遠難以忘記的一天。

English (United States): But you have changed my outlook on the human species. Maybe you… *we*, are not VERMIN after all?? I mean, you’ve helped me and done everything I asked!
Chinese: 但我對人類這個物種改觀了。也許你...*我們*，並不是有害的寄生蟲？？畢竟，我的全部要求，你都好好地完成了嘛！

English (United States): I was going to spare you anyway, but… you wouldn’t enjoy what was going to happen.
Chinese: 雖說反正我也打算放你一條生路...不過你肯定不會喜歡我的計劃的。

English (United States): Let’s focus on the food, yes? Friend?
Chinese: 我們還是專注於美食吧，怎麼樣，朋友？

English (United States): The Double Dog Combo Meal will be popular today… as was always planned, but now I plan to serve it exactly how the customer wants it. I’m sure they will enjoy it
Chinese: 今天，雙狗組合套餐一定會大受歡迎的...這也一直在我的算計之中，不過現在，我打算按照客戶的要求進行配送。他們一定會喜歡的吧！

English (United States): This was our first premises… all that time ago!
Chinese: 這裡是我們的第一塊場地...那可是好久之前啦！

English (United States): Time flies when you’re having fun, isn’t that true, best friend?
Chinese: 快樂的時光總是過得特別快，你說呢，我最好的朋友？

English (United States): I’ve brought us back here to showcase just how far we’ve come.
Chinese: 我帶你回到這裡，就是為了讓你看看我們一路已經走了多遠。

English (United States): And now that plans have… changed, I’m going to focus on making healthy meals for our customers, and growing into a legitimate business…
Chinese: 既然現在我的計劃已經...變了，我打算專注於為顧客獻上健康的餐飯，改做正經生意...

English (United States): Rather than a legitimate global threat, I mean… legitimate global threat pretending to be a busine… I mean… a means of eradicating the ENTIRE HUM… I give up. Let’s make some food, hey friend?
Chinese: 而不是正經的全球威脅，我是說...裝成廚房的正經全球威脅...我是說...徹底消滅全人類的手段...算了不說了，我們還是來做吃的吧，怎麼樣，我的朋友？

English (United States): I have made more friends! People human friends, just like me! We have so much in common… hair follicles, a large intestine… the list is endless!
Chinese: 我交了更多朋友！都是人類朋友，和我一樣！我們簡直太像了...頭部毛囊，超長的內部腸道...要是說下去可就沒個完了！

English (United States): And to think that right now they would have been in a much different place if it wasn’t for you…
Chinese: 想想吧，要是沒有你，他們現在的處境可就大大不同了...

English (United States): Speaking of humans unaware of a narrowly avoided doomsday! There’s a lot of potential customers here today, from all over the world.
Chinese: 說到人類不知不覺中躲過世界末日的事！今天大概會來很多顧客，全世界各地的都有。

English (United States): The menu on offer is large and complex and needs to be delivered to both Restaurant and Takeout customers!
Chinese: 提供的菜單不僅數量繁多、菜式複雜，而且還要通過餐館和外賣兩種渠道出售給顧客！

English (United States): My appreciation for life has led to me acquiring… a cat.
Chinese: 出於對生命的喜愛，我養了...一隻貓。

English (United States): I love the cat, and the cat loves me. I have acquired a small bed for the cat, and a selection of food stuffs for it to ingest, absorb nutrients from, and then deposit around my office!
Chinese: 我很愛這隻貓，它也很愛我。我給貓買了一張小床，還買了一些食物給它消化、吸收營養、然後再跑到我的辦公室裡排泄出來！

English (United States): I simply cannot wait to tell everyone about the cat! Hence why we are opening our drive thru during rush hour today!
Chinese: 我實在等不及把貓的事告訴大家了！所以，我們今天要在高峰時段開放汽車訂餐！

English (United States): I’m also keen to know how other humans prevent their kinetic sensor arrays getting clogged with cat hairs, have you any suggestions?
Chinese: 我也很想知道其他的人類是怎麼防止他們的運動傳感器列陣被貓毛堵住的。有沒有什麼建議？
這貓為我重新帶來了生機！

English (United States): As part of my new-found excitement for ‘life’ I have started a charity! As a human I feel sorry for things, and the things I most feel sorry for… are machines!
Chinese: 在我''重獲新生''的激動之下，我開創了一檔慈善事業！作為人類，我自然會對東西感到同情，而我最同情的就是……機器！

English (United States): So, I have started the ‘Humans giving machines a second chance’ charity! Starting with an old Toaster I found next to the highway…
Chinese: 所以，我開辦了''人類給機器第二次機會''的慈善活動！就從我在高速路邊找到的一台舊烤麵包機開始...

English (United States): What better place to raise funds for my charity than here, back at the air show! Those reviews and articles about our use of small space here worked, now we can expect crowds all after our food!
Chinese: 有什麼能比重回飛行表演更適合籌集善款呢！那些關於我們利用狹小空間的評論與文章奏效了，這下人們肯定會蜂擁而來的！

English (United States): Bacon Fries in particular will be popular, so make sure you can keep up with the influx of orders!
Chinese: 尤其是培根薯條肯定會大受歡迎，所以一定要確保廚房能跟上訂單的流量哦！

English (United States): Our continued success has led me to acquiring this space here at this local Air show! Having access to large crowds is all part of my ‘business plan’.
Chinese: 我們接連不斷的成功之後，我終於下定決心，買下當地飛行表演的這片區域！能夠接觸大量人群，正是我''商業計劃''的重要部分。

English (United States): Crowds arrive in droves to spectate at machines inefficiently generating lift… it’s beyond me, but it’s an opportunity we simply cannot afford to miss!
Chinese: 人群大量湧入，圍觀機械沒效率地產生上升力...我是搞不懂，不過這種好機會我們可不能錯過！

English (United States): Today we offer not one but two entirely new dishes! The Double Bacon Burger, AND the Plain Hot Dog!
Chinese: 今天，我們提供不止一種，而是兩種全新菜肴！雙層培根漢堡，還有普通熱狗！

English (United States): That Double Bacon Burger requires Double the amount of Cheese and Patties to produce than our previous cheese-based burger exploits, so set the Order Reader accordingly!
Chinese: 雙層培根漢堡與我們之前搞出的以奶酪為基礎的便宜貨相比，需要雙倍的奶酪與肉餅，所以別忘了對訂單讀取器做出相應的調整哦！

English (United States): Now, I’ve just booked a passenger ride in a propeller driven aeroplane, So I must be off.  My spontaneity circuit is at optimal performance today!
Chinese: 我剛剛預定了一次乘坐螺旋槳飛機的參觀，只好先走一步啦。我的主動自發電路今天表現真是不錯！
唔，朋友...這就是最後關頭了。

English (United States): This is the last kitchen we will be building… my chain of food outlets is loved the world over, and can now be left to run indefinitely, generating endless funds for my charity!
Chinese: 這將是我們建造的最後一座廚房...我的連鎖餐館在全世界廣受歡迎，接下來只要讓它們永遠運營下去，為我的慈善事業產生無窮的資金就好了！

English (United States): I want to focus on finding other machines that deserve a second chance, my friend! I’m going to head off into the sunset, with my toaster under one arm, and the cat under the other…
Chinese: 朋友啊，我想要把注意力放在尋找其他值得獲得第二次機會的機器上！我要奔向落日余暉，一隻胳膊夾着我的烤麵包爐，另一隻胳膊抱着我的貓...

English (United States): Let’s go out with a bang, shall we? The menu today is our most complex ever, offered during a busy rush hour but I know you can do it. You’ve never failed me before!
Chinese: 就來個華麗謝幕如何？今天的菜單是有史以來最複雜的一次，而且還會趕上高峰時段，不過我知道你能行。你從沒讓我失望過！

English (United States): Thank you for everything, friend! Both I… and everyone else on this planet for that matter… is indebted to you!
Chinese: 一切都要多謝你啦，朋友！不光是我...還有這個星球上的所有人類...都欠你一個大人情！

English (United States): That plane ride was ‘thrilling’. The best part was getting a birds-eye view of the many happy customers enjoying the food from our kitchen!
Chinese: 坐飛機的感覺真是''刺激''啊。最厲害的部分，就是能從高空鳥瞰到開心的顧客享受我們廚房做出來的食物！

English (United States): Now, today is an important day for precisely two reasons…
Chinese: 由於兩個原因，今天可是很重要的一天...

English (United States): Firstly, we have some new dishes, the Chicken Melt is our most complex dish to date, and Fries are now offered as a side order.
Chinese: 首先，我們添加了新的菜肴。雞肉奶酪三明治是我們迄今為止最複雜的菜品，而且還可以提供薯條作為配菜。

English (United States): To facilitate them, I’ve got us some new machinery, including the *Packaging Machine* that we will need for the fries, and the *Storage Unit* that can be used to keep meals fresh!
Chinese: 為了配合菜單，我也搞來了一些新的機器，有給薯條用的*包裝機*，還有能保持餐飯新鮮的*儲存單元*！

English (United States): Secondly, we have a critic arriving to taste our food! The critic will be arriving at some point during the service, their order should be easy to tell from the others…
Chinese: 其次，今天有一位評論家會來品嚐我們的食物！這位評論家將在服務中的某個時間到達，他的訂單應該也和別人很不一樣...

English (United States): Just try your best to ensure their order makes it to service! The critic will be less patient than the other humans we serve!
Chinese: 總之，評論家的訂單一定要完成配送！他們與我們服務的其他人類相比，耐心可要差很多呢！

English (United States): I love music, don’t you? There’s music of the ‘rock’ variety being performed here tonight!
Chinese: 我超愛音樂的，你呢？今天晚上，這裡將會表演''搖滾''音樂！

English (United States): Have you noticed how the chance of us humans combining Cheese, Bacon AND Fries increases with the progress of the time of the day?
Chinese: 你有沒有注意到，隨着一天中時間越來越晚，我們人類把奶酪、培根和薯條組合到一起的幾率也就越來越大？

English (United States): It reaches night, and apparently anything can be put on Fries? How curious!
Chinese: 而且一到晚上，什麼都能放到薯條上？多奇怪啊！

English (United States): Being such a patheti… I mean ‘predictable’ species, we can determine an influx of customers when the first musical act has finished tonight.
Chinese: 作為如此可悲...啊不對是''容易預測''的物種，我們可以估計到，當今晚的第一場音樂表演結束之後，會有大量顧客湧入。

English (United States): We will have orders come through at a faster rate than normal! I will alert you to when the *Rush Hour* has started, make sure you plan the kitchen to be able to handle it!
Chinese: 收到訂單的速度會比平常高許多！當*高峰時段*到來時，我會提醒你的。別忘了，廚房的規劃一定要能夠應付才行！

English (United States): Ah, to be back at the air show… Our profits here last time were such that I got us a bigger kitchen today!
Chinese: 啊，又回到飛行表演了...我們上次的利潤實在太豐厚，我今天甚至搞了個更大的廚房！

English (United States): I’ve defined our menu for today with our most popular and profitable recipes, there’s a lot to fit in this kitchen, but it will be easy for you!
Chinese: 我把今天的菜單換上了我們最受歡迎也最賺錢的食譜，所以這個廚房裡也要塞很多東西，不過對你來說一定很簡單！

English (United States): I’ve seen the way you mercilessly cram all those machines together… Don’t think I haven’t noticed that… Oh I’m keeping an eye on you alright…
Chinese: 我看過你把那些機器狂塞硬擠的無情樣子...別以為我沒注意到...我會好好盯緊你的...

English (United States): But I… need to trust you… soon enough you’ll help me achieve something big! Something humans will remember for as long as they live!
Chinese: 但我...需要信任你...很快，你就會幫我完成一番大事業！一件只要人類還活着，就會牢牢記住的大事業！

English (United States): Anyway! Let’s get this (air) show on the road!
Chinese: 總之！這次就讓我們一飛沖天吧！

English (United States): Today we break new ground by offering a brand-new combo meal! The Packaging machine can be used to combine two individual complete dishes into a single, boxed meal!
Chinese: 今天，我們要大搞突破，提供一種全新的組合套餐！只要用包裝機，就可以將兩個單獨的成品菜肴組合成一個盒裝套餐！

English (United States): In this kitchen, Fries need to be delivered in the Combo Meal *AND* as a side dish on their own…
Chinese: 在這個廚房裡，薯條不僅要在組合套餐中進行配送，*還要*獨自作為一道配菜配送...

English (United States): There is plenty of space to have two production lines for Fries here, but the most economical way would be to have a single production line for Fries used for both order types...
Chinese: 這裡的空間足夠放下兩條專門製作薯條的生產線，不過最經濟的辦法是用一條生產線，同時為兩種訂單製作薯條...

English (United States): Fries could be put into a Storage Unit, then Robot Arms controlled by order readers could pick up the fries needed as a side order or as part of the Combo Meal.
Chinese: 薯條可以放入儲存單元，然後可以用訂單讀取器控制機械臂拾取需要的薯條，供配菜或組合套餐的訂單使用。

English (United States): Good luck today! Remember to check the recipes if you are unsure about the new Dopamine combo meal.
Chinese: 祝你今天好運！如果沒記住今天多巴胺組合套餐的食譜，別忘了再去確認一下哦！

English (United States): This is a new location for us but pay attention! This part of town has a particularly old power grid…
Chinese: 這裡是一個全新的地點，不過一定要注意！這片城區的電網格外老舊……

English (United States): If we use too much electricity, we will cause a *blackout*, bringing our operations here to an end, so do be careful and pay close attention to that energy usage!
Chinese: 如果消耗的電力過多，就會出現*停電*，這裡的運營也會徹底結束。所以，一定要多加小心，隨時留意電力消耗情況！

English (United States): As we saw during our Power Usage experiment in the test site, we can take measures to reduce our energy usage here.
Chinese: 我們在測試場地進行電力消耗實驗時也看到了，我們可以採取特定措施，降低電力消耗。

English (United States): I’ve even managed to get us some new machinery to reduce the overall footprint of our kitchens and make us more efficient!
Chinese: 我甚至還搞了一些新的機器，用來降低我們廚房的行經路程，讓廚房更有效率！

English (United States): Oh… and I have also just heard that a celebrity I’ve never heard of was seen eating one of our BLT’s! I expect that dish to be particularly popular amongst the customers today!
Chinese: 啊...還有，我聽說，有人看到一位我從來沒聽說過的名人在吃我們的BLT三明治！估計今天這個菜品一定會很受顧客歡迎！

English (United States): Back at the park… I have fond memories here. Like the rest of our species, I use magnetic core memory to recall everything I have done in the last 50 days.
Chinese: 又回到公園了...我在這裡有着很美好的回憶。和我的同胞一樣，我會用磁力核心存儲器來記錄過去50天內我所做過的一切。

English (United States): We really have a lot in common don’t we!
Chinese: 我們的共同點還真是多啊，你說呢！

English (United States): Today is a showcase for us. I theorise that we can get two complex dishes out of this limited space!
Chinese: 今天可是我們展現能力的好時機。根據我的理論，我們可以在這個狹窄的空間裡搞出兩種複雜的菜肴！

English (United States): So confident am I, that I have invited a critic who also writes for a magazine that focuses on efficient use of small spaces!
Chinese: 我很有信心，所以請了一位評論家來。這位評論家同時還為一家主要講述如何有效利用狹小空間的雜誌供稿哦！

English (United States): I’m sure both readers of the magazine will appreciate what you are capable of and become customers in the future!
Chinese: 我敢肯定，那本雜誌的兩位讀者一定會欣賞你的能力，也會成為我們未來的顧客！

English (United States): I’ve got something slightly different for us today…
Chinese: 今天我給你準備了一點不一樣的...

English (United States): Are you familiar with speed eating?
Chinese: 你對快速進食有瞭解嗎？

English (United States): A local human is trying to set the record for eating the most Plain Burgers in two minutes!
Chinese: 一個本地人類正想打破兩分鐘內吃下最多普通漢堡的紀錄！

English (United States): 3.5 Billion years of evolution… each mutation and adaptation… leading to this: A human wanting to be recognised as having eaten 50 burgers in the fastest time… Just, why?
Chinese: 35億年的進化...多少種變異與適應...居然會走向這個結局：一位人類想要在最快時間內吃下50個漢堡，以此搏出位...到底為什麼啊？

English (United States): The burgers are going to have to be prepared fresh, so you will need to optimise a kitchen layout that can rapidly produce *50 Plain Burgers* in the *2 minutes*, good luck!
Chinese: 漢堡必須現場準備，所以你需要對廚房佈局進行優化，讓它能在*2分鐘*內做出*50個普通漢堡*。祝你好運！

English (United States): There’s a Volleyball competition here at the beach today, it’s immensely uninteresting yet for some reason, humans love it!
Chinese: 今天在沙灘會舉辦排球比賽，雖說完全沒有任何趣味可言，但不知為什麼，人類就是特別喜歡！

English (United States): Now I know what you’re thinking… “this premises has a notoriously flaky electrical supply, how on earth can we make enough food to satisfy a big crowd?”
Chinese: 我知道你在想什麼...''這片場地的供電一向不好，要我怎麼做出足夠的食物，填飽一大群人的肚子？''

English (United States): Well, my fellow warm-blooded sack of organs, I have a cunning idea!
Chinese: 唔，跟我一樣身為血肉之軀的人類，我有一個很妙的主意！

English (United States): I am syphoning electricity from the neighbour, but I expect them to soon realise what we are doing, so we need to act fast!
Chinese: 我從鄰居那裡偷來了電，但我估計他們很快就會發現我們的小把戲，所以動作一定要快！

English (United States): You need to make *50 Beach Burgers* in *3 Minutes*! It’s a tough ask, but I know you can do it!
Chinese: 你需要在*3分鐘*內製作*50個沙灘漢堡*！雖說這任務很艱難，但我知道你一定能做到的！

English (United States): Hello again, friend! I’ve got a unique opportunity for us tonight…
Chinese: 又見面了，朋友！今晚有個十分獨特的機遇...

English (United States): Two of the worlds premier musical talents are playing back to back, with a short intermission in between…
Chinese: 有兩位音樂新人將會接連進行首演，中間有一段短暫的休息時間...

English (United States): The crowds are bound to be hungry, but they’ll be keen to get back into the venue as fast as possible!
Chinese: 聽眾一定餓得不行，但也肯定特別想儘快回到場地內聽音樂！

English (United States): So we need a kitchen that can produce *100 Cheesy Dogs* in *3 minutes*!
Chinese: 所以，我們需要一個能在*3分鐘*內製作*100個奶酪熱狗*的廚房！

English (United States): Today we’re back at the offices, the CEO jokingly said that if sales were doubled this month, he’d buy everyone a meal... Sales increased by 400%!
Chinese: 今天我們又回到辦公室了。之前CEO半開玩笑地說，如果這個月的銷量能夠翻倍，他就請所有人吃飯...結果銷量提升了400%！

English (United States): Well it might have been a joke, but one threat of legal action later, and we’re here to deliver on that promise!
Chinese: 雖說可能是個玩笑，但有人威脅要提起訴訟，所以我們就被請來實現他的承諾啦！

English (United States): The CEO is keen to get this over an done with as quickly as possible. We’ve been asked to produce *30 Double Bypass Meals* in *5 minutes*!
Chinese: CEO希望這一切能儘快完成，越快越好。要求是在*5分鐘*內做出*30份心臟搭橋套餐*！

English (United States): It’s time to show what you can do!
Chinese: 是時候展現一下你的實力了！

English (United States): We’ve got a ‘birthday’ party here today.
Chinese: 我們這裡今天要搞一個''生日''派對。

English (United States): Were you aware that some humans celebrate the day they detached from their production unit? I’ve never heard of such a thing!
Chinese: 你知不知道，有些人類會慶祝他們從生產單元中脫離的那一天？我還從來沒聽說過這種事！

English (United States): Anyway, a small human being is celebrating its eighth involuntary cycle around the sun. What an arbitrary achievement…
Chinese: 總之，一個幼年人類正在慶祝自己繞太陽公轉第八次。這種成就也太無厘頭了...

English (United States): There are 25 families here who all deem it enough of an accomplishment to spend the afternoon here. The more I think about it, the more it irritates me. So, let’s get it over with, shall we?
Chinese: 有25個家庭認為，能在這裡呆一下午是個蠻不錯的成就。我真是越想越煩。所以，我們就速戰速決吧？

English (United States): Produce *25 Large Family Meals* in *5 minutes*. The sooner all those screaming kids are out of here, the sooner we can get on with our lives!
Chinese: 在*5分鐘*中製作*25份大份家族套餐*。越快把這些尖叫的孩子打發走，我們就能越早回歸正常生活！

English (United States): Hello, my dear carbon-based partner! It's great to have you here again. I have been working very hard on researching new recipes lately.
Chinese: 你好啊，我親愛的碳基生物搭檔！再見到你真是太好了。我最近一直在努力研發新食譜。

English (United States): Thanks to the wonders of the jet age, I have traveled to the Far East and returned with a couple of new dishes for us to try!
Chinese: 多虧了噴氣時代的奇跡，我飛到了遠東，帶回了一些新的菜肴。我們來試試吧！

English (United States): There are people from all over the country attending this airshow today, so it's the perfect opportunity to try them out!
Chinese: 今天參加航空展的人們來自全國各地。所以，這正是嘗試它們的最佳時機！

English (United States): We'll be offering Kung Pao Chicken and Steamed Rice. I know that with your extraordinary human intelligence those recipes won't be a problem!
Chinese: 我們會供應宮保雞丁和蒸米飯。我知道，有了你那超群絕倫的人類智慧，這些食譜一定不成問題！

English (United States): Particularly now that you can count on a brand new machine: the Food Steamer! Just remember: it needs to be connected to a Storage Tank full of water via a Pump in order to operate.
Chinese: 而且現在，你還可以使用一種全新的機器：食品蒸制機！不過要記住：需要將它用泵機連接到裝水的儲罐，才能使用哦。

English (United States): Get to work, there is no time to lose!
Chinese: 快開工吧，我們可不能再浪費時間了！

English (United States): Our new recipes have been so successful that I couldn't resist the call of my temptation circuits to try something new yet again!
Chinese: 我們的全新食譜大獲成功，我的電路也急不可耐，想再嘗試些新的事物。這誘惑，我完全無法抗拒！

English (United States): Today we have Dumplings in the menu, and we'll be selling them in servings of 11 units. 11 in binary at least, I think you might know that particular number as 3.
Chinese: 今天我們的菜單會加入餃子，每11個餃子為一份。是說二進制的11啦，你大概也知道，這個數字其實就是3。

English (United States): Keep in mind that Dumplings need to be cooked using the Food Steamer and not any other methods!
Chinese: 別忘了，餃子要使用食品蒸制機製作，不要錯用了別的方法哦！

English (United States): Are you ready to assemble, steam and package? I hope so! Pay close attention to the recipe, it can be tricky to get it right!
Chinese: 準備好組裝、蒸制、打包了嗎？希望如此！一定要仔細留意食譜，這次還是有一定難度的哦！

English (United States): Oriental cuisine seems to be experiencing a boom in popularity lately, according to some human subject research I have been performing.
Chinese: 我對一些人類進行調研取得的數據顯示，來自東方的菜肴最近似乎特別受歡迎。

English (United States): They all volunteered to help me, don't look at me like that! Well, after using my sharp persuasion skills, that is.
Chinese: 別這麼看着我，他們都是自願參與調研的好嘛！唔，反正一用上我鋭利的說服技巧，他們就都自願參與了。

English (United States): Anyway, today we'll be serving Kung Pao Chicken and Dumplings. Be careful not to mix the take-out and the restaurant orders, as we'll be accepting both types of customers.
Chinese: 扯遠了。今天，我們要製作的是宮保雞丁和餃子。今天我們會服務餐館和外賣兩個類型的顧客，可別把訂單弄混了。

English (United States): What a glorious day to cook some delicious Asian meals! Don't you agree? My taste receptors are generating saliva at the thought!
Chinese: 今天真是適合烹飪亞洲菜肴的一天！你不覺得嗎？光是想到這裡，我的味覺接收器就開始產生唾液了呢！

English (United States): I thought I should try my own kitchen layout… I think you’ll agree it looks wonderful, but there’s a flaw in its design!
Chinese: 我想試試我自己的廚房佈局...你一定覺得看起來很棒，但其實設計上有一個缺陷！

English (United States): Please help me? Can you fix it and show me the errors of my ways?
Chinese: 能不能幫幫我？能不能幫我修復缺陷，讓我看看自己到底錯在哪裡？

English (United States): WHO’S THERE?! I’LL EXTERMINATE ON SIGHT!
Chinese: 什麼人？！報上名來，不然格殺勿論！

English (United States): Oh! It’s you… My apologies, fellow human!
Chinese: 啊！是你啊...抱歉了，人類同伴！

English (United States): The power constraints here at the beach are literally grinding my gears… I’ve tried to make an efficient layout myself, but it keeps causing a blackout!
Chinese: 沙灘這裡的電力限制真是氣得我齒（輪）根癢癢...我自己也試過能不能做一套高效率的佈局，結果總是搞到停電！

English (United States): Can you fix it for me please?
I have designed this kitchen, but it’s especially… ‘flammable’ at the moment. I’ve tried my best to fight the many fires that seem inevitable here…
Chinese: 這個廚房是我設計的，但目前的樣子特別...''易燃''。看來火災不可避免，我已經盡力在撲救了...

English (United States): I can’t bear to get the emergency services involved! They ask too many questions… “Where did you get this technology?!”, “That’s not safe for civilians!” Blah blah blah!
Chinese: 我可不能把緊急救援署的人扯進來！他們的問題太多了...''你從哪兒搞來的這種科技？！''，還有''這樣存在安全隱患！''，廢話一大堆。

English (United States): You have an excellent grasp of kitchen layouts… can you make the necessary changes to prevent the fires? Please?
Chinese: 你對廚房佈局的掌控這麼厲害...能不能做些調整，防止火災呢？拜託了！

English (United States): Do this for me, and I’ll make sure to spare you... I mean, be sure to thank you!
Chinese: 幫我辦好這件事，到時候我就饒你一命...啊，我是說，到時候我就好好謝謝你！

English (United States): I’ve been trying to maximise a menu based on what’s possible with a humble hot dog…
Chinese: 我一直想搞個完全基於簡單熱狗的菜單，能搞多少菜品就搞多少菜品...

English (United States): I have three types of hot dog here, but I’ve realised they can also be combined into the Hot Dog Sampler meal!
Chinese: 我這裡有三種熱狗，但我發現，還可以把他們組到一起，形成熱狗薈萃套餐！

English (United States): Can you configure this kitchen so that it makes a Hot Dog Sampler Meal as well as the different Hot Dog types? All within my budget of course!
Chinese: 能不能把這個廚房弄成既能產出熱狗薈萃套餐，又能單獨產出各個不同熱狗種類的樣子？當然，要維持在我的預算之內哦！

English (United States): I do appreciate the irony of watching a human inadvertently engineer the downfall of a civilisation!
Chinese: 我最喜歡看一個人類在無意之中造成了整個文明的末日，這種諷刺真是太妙啦！

English (United States): Did I say that out loud? My circuits are all over the place today!
Chinese: 我剛才是不是大聲說出來了？今天我的電路真是太亂來啦！

English (United States): So I just need to connect this… er… No, wait… Yes, that arm connects to… no… Hmmmm, Got it! Wait. No… The… er…
Chinese: 所以我要把這個連到...呃...不對，等一下...沒錯，那個機械臂要連到...不對...唔，好了！等一下。不對...那個...呃...

English (United States): Good, you’re here! I was trying to get this kitchen up and running before the customers started arriving!
Chinese: 啊，你來了，太好了！我正打算在顧客出現之前讓這個廚房開動起來呢！

English (United States): But I can’t quite get it right, maybe I should stick to planning global domination, am I right?
Chinese: 但我說什麼就是弄不對，也許我還是專心搞制霸全球的事比較好，你說呢？

English (United States): I accept that your human brain is better than my human brain at planning these kitchens, maybe I should just leave everything up to you!
Chinese: 我承認，你的人類大腦確實比我的人類大腦更擅長對這些廚房進行規劃，也許還是把一切都交給你去做比較好！

English (United States): Hello again, fellow human! I have a new and exciting challenge for you today!
Chinese: 你好啊，人類夥伴！今天我為你準備了一個刺激的新挑戰！

English (United States): From what I’ve gathered some of the local communities have a strange celebration every year, in which they are forced to eat enormous amounts of food!
Chinese: 從我收集的情報來看，本地部分社區每年都會舉辦一次奇怪的慶典；在此期間，他們被迫要吃掉大量的食物！

English (United States): I think it’s something related to turkeys and pilgrims, but it doesn’t matter. What does matter is the brilliant business opportunity that’s in front of us!
Chinese: 我覺得這與夥計和朝聖有關，不過沒關係。重要的是擺在我們面前的絕佳商業機會！

English (United States): We’ll be adding two new dishes to the menu today: Pumpkin Pie and Cornbread, as a little test run of a new machine I have been able to source: the Oven!
Chinese: 今天我們要向菜單中加兩道菜：南瓜派和玉米麵包，以此來測試下我剛買的一台新機器：烤箱！

English (United States): Ovens allow you to create exciting new dishes, but they can only cook one food item at once, and they are extremely slow, so plan accordingly. Good luck!
Chinese: 烤箱可以讓你烹制新的美味佳肴，但每次只能做一道菜，而且速度極慢，所以請仔細規劃。祝你好運！

English (United States): Welcome back! Our last experiment involving the new recipes and the Oven went so smoothly that I’ve secured some additional funds to expand this location.
Chinese: 歡迎回來！我們上次對新配方和烤箱的實驗一切順利，所以我多搞了點資金，打算把這裡擴建下。

English (United States): Now we’ll be serving our most complicated dish yet: the Roast Turkey. I’ve heard that humans like us go crazy for this particular bird at this time of the year…
Chinese: 現在我們將為顧客獻上最複雜的美食：烤火雞。我聽說每年在這個時候，像我們這樣的人類特別喜歡這種鳥。

English (United States): ...So we’ll turn that into juicy, juicy profits! You will need to prepare the stuffing in an Assembler first, then use another Assembler to combine it with the Raw Turkey and then put everything in the Oven.
Chinese: ……所以我們會把它變成豐厚的利潤！你需要先在組合機準備餡料，然後再用一台組合機將它與生火雞組合好後，放入烤箱。

English (United States): And don’t forget that the stuffing requires some Fresh Herbs. Go get some work done, and stop wasting my thyme!
Chinese: 別忘了填料需要新鮮香料。去找點活幹，還有，別浪費我的百里香！

English (United States): The Thanksgiving season is coming to an end and I think today we’ll get more orders than ever before! I’ve set up our location to accept orders from our restaurant but also provide take-out meals.
Chinese: 感恩季就要結束了，我覺得今天的訂單會比平時更多！我把這裡設為既可以接受餐廳點餐，也提供外賣服務。

English (United States): You will have your Ovens working overtime today, with all those customers that will be coming your way. Remember you can use Splitters to split the workload of baking your meals between a couple of different Ovens!
Chinese: 今天有那麼多客人要來，你的烤箱要加班了。記住，你可以用使用分離機，讓多個烤箱分攤烘焙的工作量！

English (United States): I have also added Sweet Potatoes to the menu, as according to my organic taste receptors, they should pair well with the Turkey. I’m sure they will be a massive success!
Chinese: 我還在菜單上加了番薯。根據我的有機味覺接受器判斷，它們應當與夥計搭配。我肯定它們的組合能大獲成功！

English (United States): What are you grateful for, my friend? I am certainly grateful for the fact that you are such a great employee… And for the fact that most humans are so gullible!
Chinese: 我的朋友，你要為何感恩？我為有你這麼出色的員工而心懷感激。還有，我為大部分人類如此愚昧而感恩！

English (United States): These kitchens are getting complex! Machines will now start to *break down* if they are overworked! A new machine, the *Mechanic Mechanic* will fix any broken machine in its radius!
Chinese: 這些廚房真是越來越複雜了！機器如果工作負荷過大，就會出現*故障*！新的機器：智能機修工可以修好其範圍內的故障機器！

English (United States): There’s a new threat in town… *Insects*! If we leave ingredients standing for too long, they will attract those pesky bugs! The new *Xterminator* will help eradicate any infestations!
Chinese: 新的威脅出現了...*蟲災*！如果把食材放置太久，就會吸引這些可惡的蟲子！新的*滅殺者*可以消除蟲害！

English (United States): Configure which dishes will be available in your scenario. Modifiers can be applied to main course dishes to increase the difficulty of your scenario. Setting modifiers unlocks related level objectives, which can be set in the Objectives tab.
Chinese: 設置場景中可用的菜肴。你也可以對主菜添加修正，提升場景的難度。設定修正也會解鎖相關的關卡任務目標，可在任務目標選項卡中進行設置。

English (United States): Enter a description about your kitchen here!
You haven't met the scenario's objectives.
Chinese: 你尚未達成場景的任務目標。

English (United States): Toggle on/off the machines you want to be available for players to use in your scenario.
Chinese: 打開/關閉場景中可供玩家使用的機器。
新場景 - 選擇一個主題

English (United States): You have not created any Scenarios
You are not subscribed to any Scenarios. Head to the Workshop to view the available Scenarios
Chinese: 您沒有訂閱任何場景。請前往創意工坊查看可用場景

English (United States): Deliver <color=#c18c26>X</color> dishes during a Rush Hour
Chinese: 在高峰時段中完成<color=#c18c26>X</color>份菜肴的配送。

English (United States): Deliver a meal to the Food Critic
Chinese: 為美食評論家配送一餐

English (United States): Make sure no disasters of any kind occur
Chinese: 確保不會發生任何災難

English (United States): Use <color=#c18c26>X</color>,000 Wh of electrical energy or less
Chinese: 電力消耗不超過<color=#c18c26>X</color>千瓦時。

English (United States): You have fulfilled all objectives in the scenario, congratulations! This means that you are now allowed to share this scenario with the rest of the community!
Chinese: 恭喜，你完成了場景的全部任務目標！這也意味着你現在可以向其他社區玩家分享此場景了！

English (United States): Configure the objectives that determine the difficulty of your scenario, then set the budget players will have to adhere to. Turning on Rush Hour will add to the difficulty, increasing the number of orders.
Chinese: 設置決定場景難度的任務目標，然後設定玩家需要遵守的預算。開啟高峰時段選項會提升訂單數量，提升難度。

English (United States): You have made changes to this scenario, so you need to play again and fulfill all objectives before you can share it with the rest of the community.
Chinese: 你已對此場景進行了更改，因此需要再次進行遊戲並滿足全部任務目標，方可將其分享給其他社區玩家。

English (United States): Would you like to set the current kitchen layout as the initial layout for this scenario? This means that other players will start this level with the machines you have in your kitchen right now.
Chinese: 是否要將當前的廚房佈局設置為此場景的初始佈局？這意味着其他玩家將會以你廚房中當前的機器開始本關卡。

English (United States): The current kitchen layout exceeds the budget limitation so it cannot be set as the initial kitchen layout for this scenario.
Chinese: 當前廚房佈局已經超出預算，因此無法被設置為此場景的初始廚房佈局。

English (United States): Take a snapshot of your scenario kitchen, the image will be used as a preview image in the Scenario Menu and on Steam Workshop if you choose to publish this kitchen.
Chinese: 為你的場景廚房拍攝截圖，並將其用於場景菜單的預覽圖片。如果你選擇將此廚房發布至Steam創意工坊，此截圖也會成為創意工坊的預覽圖。

English (United States): Take a snapshot of your scenario kitchen. This image is going to be used as the scenario preview image.
Chinese: 為你的場景廚房拍攝截圖，並將其用於場景菜單的預覽圖片。

English (United States): This image is going to be used as the scenario preview image. Are you happy with it?
Chinese: 此圖片將被用於場景預覽圖片。你對此圖片是否滿意？

English (United States): You should write a description for your scenario.
Chinese: 請為你的場景寫一段描述。

English (United States): You should select at least one main course for your scenario.
Chinese: 請為你的場景選擇至少一道主菜。

English (United States): You have selected the same dish more than once.
Chinese: 你多次選擇了同一道菜肴。

English (United States): You have selected the same objective more than once.
Chinese: 你多次選擇了同一個任務目標。

English (United States): You have selected an objective to deliver a dish to the Food Critic but none of your main course dishes have the Food Critic modifier turned on.
Chinese: 你已將一個任務目標設定成為美食評論家配送一道菜肴，但你的主菜菜肴均未啟用美食評論家修正選項。

English (United States): You should choose a name for your scenario.
Chinese: 請為你的場景起一個名字。

English (United States): You should select at least one objective for your scenario.
Chinese: 請為你的場景選擇至少一個任務目標。

English (United States): You have selected an objective to deliver dishes during a Rush Hour but have turned the Rush Hour setting off.
Chinese: 你已將一個任務目標設定為在一個高峰時段中配送菜肴，但你關閉了高峰時段設定。

English (United States): Unable to load Steam Workshop content
Chinese: 未能加載Steam創意工坊內容

English (United States): There was an error when trying to publish your scenario on the Steam Workshop. Please try again later.
Chinese: 嘗試將你的場景發布至Steam創意工坊時發生錯誤。請稍後再試。

English (United States): Reminder: In order for your item to be publicly visible you need to accept the Steam Workshop terms of service. The Steam Overlay will open after you close this window so you can review your item and accept the terms of service if you haven't done so yet.
Chinese: 提示：為了讓你的物品能夠對公眾可見，你需要接受Steam創意工坊的服務條款。在你關閉此窗口後，Steam界面會自動打開，供你核對你的物品，並接受服務條款（如果尚未接受）。

English (United States): It looks like you have uploaded this scenario to the Workshop before. Would you like to update the currently published item? If you choose no, it will be published as a new scenario.
Chinese: 你之前似乎已經將這個場景上傳到了創意工坊。是否要更新當前已發布的物品？如果選擇不更新，此場景則會作為新場景發布。

English (United States): Would you like to publish this scenario on the Steam Workshop so the entire community is able to download it and play it?
Chinese: 是否要將此場景上傳至Steam創意工坊，供整個玩家社區下載遊玩？

English (United States): The scenario has been successfully published to the Steam Workshop!
Chinese: 場景已成功發布至Steam創意工坊！

English (United States): By submitting this item, you agree to the Steam Workshop terms of service.
Chinese: 若提交此物品，則代表你接受Steam創意工坊的服務條款。

English (United States): You cannot publish this scenario on the Steam Workshop until you have played it and fulfilled every objective first.
Chinese: 你需要進行遊戲並完成全部任務目標，方可將此場景發布至Steam創意工坊。

English (United States): Please wait while we upload the scenario to the Steam Workshop, this might take a while...
Chinese: 請稍候，我們正在將場景上傳至Steam創意工坊。此過程可能需要花費一段時間...
圖形用戶界面聲音音量

English (United States): Switching to a different language requires a restart of the game. Would you like to proceed?
Chinese: 切換至其他語言需要重新啟動遊戲。要繼續嗎？

English (United States): Hello there fellow human being! Thank you for responding to my advertisement, helping me in setting up my new restaurant chain!
Chinese: 你好啊，人類同胞！多謝你回應我的廣告，幫我建立新的連鎖餐館！

English (United States): My plan is to use fully autonomous kitchens, to cut costs and crush mankind! I mean… efficiently produce wholesome, tasty dishes! The kind humans like us love to digest!
Chinese: 我的計劃是使用完全自動的廚房，節約成本、碾碎全人類！啊，我是說...高效產出美味營養的菜肴！就是我們人類最喜歡攝入的那種！

English (United States): Before we start on our first restaurant, we need to prove the concept… I’ve rented this test site for us to use. Follow my instructions, and let’s make sure this ‘business’ plan of mine is feasible!
Chinese: 在我們開設第一家餐館之前，我們需要證實一下這個概念...我租下了這片測試場地，供我們使用。跟隨我的指示，讓我的''商業''計劃成為現實吧！

English (United States): You can move the camera with the *{CameraUp}*, *{CameraLeft}*, *{CameraDown}* and *{CameraRight}* keys, and cycle between camera positions using the *{CameraRotateLeft}* and *{CameraRotateRight}* keys. You can also zoom in or out using the *scroll wheel* in your mouse.
Chinese: 你可以使用鍵盤上的*{CameraUp}*、*{CameraLeft}*、*{CameraDown}*、*{CameraRight}*鍵移動視角，並使用*{CameraRotateLeft}*與*{CameraRotateRight}*鍵循環切換視角位置。此外，還可以使用鼠標的*滾輪*進行縮放。

English (United States): You can move the view around using [PanCameraHorizontal]. You can also zoom in or out using [ZoomCameraIn]/[ZoomCameraOut].
Chinese: 你可以使用[PanCameraHorizontal]移動視角，也可以使用[ZoomCameraIn]/[ZoomCameraOut]進行縮放。
