English (United States): Let’s start by making a very simple kitchen that can only make *Plain Burgers*! We’ll start by placing an *Assembler*, a machine that combines ingredients into a finished dish.
Chinese: 我們先來做一個只能製作*普通漢堡*的簡單廚房吧！首先放置一台*組合機*，這個機器可以將食材組合成完成的菜肴。

English (United States): Click on the *Assembler* in the Parts List, then place it in the marked location. Parts can be rotated using the *{PartRotateLeft}* and *{PartRotateRight}* Keys. You will need to rotate the Assembler so that its outputs are facing the conveyor belt.
Chinese: 在部件列表中點擊*組合機*，然後將其放置在標記的地點。你可以用*{PartRotateLeft}*和*{PartRotateRight}*鍵旋轉部件。你需要旋轉組合機，讓它的產出方向面對傳送帶。

English (United States): Press [ToggleFocus] to view the Parts List, then select the *Assembler*. Next, place it in the marked location. Parts can be rotated using the [RotateLeft] and [RotateRight] buttons. You will need to rotate the Assembler so that its outputs are facing the conveyor belt.
Chinese: 按下[ToggleFocus]查看部件列表，然後選擇*組合機*。接下來，將其放置在標記的地點。你可以用[RotateLeft]和[RotateRight]旋轉部件。你需要旋轉組合機，讓它的產出方向面對傳送帶。

English (United States): Great! Now right click on the *Assembler* and select *Plain Burger* as the dish to be assembled. I love telling those dumb machines what to do, just like you, partner!
Chinese: 好極了！現在右鍵點擊*組合機*，然後將*普通漢堡*選為要組合的菜肴。我最喜歡告訴那些蠢機器該幹什麼了，和你一樣哦，搭檔！

English (United States): Great! Now highlight the *Assembler* and press [ConfigurePart] to view its settings. Select *Plain Burger* as the dish to be assembled. I love telling those dumb machines what to do, just like you, partner!
Chinese: 好極了！現在高亮選中*組合機*，然後按下[ConfigurePart]查看其設置。選擇*普通漢堡*作為要組合的菜肴。我最喜歡告訴那些蠢機器該幹什麼了，和你一樣哦，搭檔！

English (United States): Before we place any more machines, let’s have a look at the recipe to see what we will need. Click on the *Recipes* button to view the Plain Burger recipe.
Chinese: 放置其他機器之前，我們先來看看食譜，檢查一下我們都需要什麼。點擊*食譜按鈕*，查看普通漢堡的食譜。

English (United States): Before we place any more machines, let’s have a look at the recipe to see what we will need. Press [ToggleRecipes] to view the Plain Burger recipe.
Chinese: 放置其他機器之前，我們先來看看食譜，檢查一下我們都需要什麼。按下[ToggleRecipes]，查看普通漢堡的食譜。

English (United States): Now click on *OK* to close the settings panel.
Chinese: 接下來，點擊*確定*關閉設置面板。

English (United States): Now select *OK* to close the Properties Window and save the changes.
Chinese: 現在，選擇*確定*關閉屬性窗口，保存更改。

English (United States): Hmmm, that burger looks good! My taste sensors, I mean ‘taste buds’ are going crazy! So the recipe says we need one *Burger Bun*, and one *Raw Patty*, which we will need to cook….
Chinese: 唔，這個漢堡看起來很不錯！我的味覺傳感器...啊，我是說''味蕾''已經蠢蠢欲動了！按照食譜，我們需要一個*漢堡麵包*，還有一個*生肉餅*，然後要把它做熟...

English (United States): There are some machines we can use to dispense, cook and transport the ingredients. Close the recipes tab by pressing the *Okay* button.
Chinese: 這裡有一些機器，可以用於分配、烹飪和運輸食材。點擊*好的*按鈕即可關閉食譜標籤。

English (United States): There are some machines we can use to dispense, cook and transport the ingredients. Close the recipes tab by pressing [ToggleRecipes].
Chinese: 這裡有一些機器，可以用於分配、烹飪和運輸食材。按下[ToggleRecipes]即可關閉食譜標籤。

English (United States): Select the *Dispenser* in the Parts list, and place two of them in the locations I’ve marked. Don’t forget to use the *{PartRotateLeft}* and *{PartRotateRight}* Keys to rotate them so they face the Assembler
Chinese: 在部件列表中選擇''分配器''，然後在我標記的位置放上兩台。不要忘記使用*{PartRotateLeft}*和*{PartRotateRight}*鍵旋轉，讓它們面對組合機哦！

English (United States): Press [ToggleFocus] and select the *Dispenser* in the Parts list, and place two of them in the locations I’ve marked. Don’t forget to use [RotateLeft] and [RotateRight] to rotate them so they face the Assembler.
Chinese: 按下[ToggleFocus]在部件列表中選擇*分配器*，然後在我標記的位置放上兩台。不要忘記使用[RotateLeft]和[RotateRight]旋轉，讓它們面對組合機哦！

English (United States): Now, right click the top one and configure it to dispense *Burger Buns*.
Chinese: 接下來，右鍵單擊上方的機器，將其設置為分配*漢堡麵包*。

English (United States): Now, highlight the top one and press [ConfigurePart] to open its settings, then configure it to dispense *Burger Buns*.
Chinese: 接下來，高亮選擇上方的機器，按下[ConfigurePart]打開設置，將其設定為分配*漢堡麵包*。

English (United States): Now, right click the other and set it to *Raw Patties*.
Chinese: 接下來，右鍵點擊另一台，將其設置為分配*生肉餅*。

English (United States): Now highlight the other, press [ConfigurePart] and set it to dispense *Raw Patties*.
Chinese: 接下來，高亮選擇另一台，按下[ConfigurePart]，將其設置為分配*生肉餅*。

English (United States): So now we have got a source of *Raw Patties*, we will need a means of cooking them… A *Grill* will do the job! Select a *Grill* from the parts list, and place it in the location I have marked!
Chinese: 既然我們有了*生肉餅*，就需要準備烹飪的方法...用*烤架*就行了！在部件列表中選擇*烤架*，然後放到我標記的位置吧！

English (United States): Great work, let’s get those ingredients moving! select the *Conveyor Belt* from the parts list, and place them in the locations I have marked. Remember to rotate them using the *{PartRotateLeft}* and *{PartRotateRight}* keys, so that they transport the ingredients in the direction of the Assembler!
Chinese: 幹得漂亮，讓那些食材運動起來吧！在部件列表中選擇*傳送帶*，然後將它們放置到我標記的位置。別忘了使用*{PartRotateLeft}*和*{PartRotateRight}*鍵旋轉傳送帶，讓它們把食材送往組合機的方向！

English (United States): Great work! Press [ToggleFocus] and select the *Conveyor Belt* from the parts list, then place them in the locations I have marked. Remember to rotate them using the [RotateLeft] and [RotateRight] buttons so that they transport the ingredients in the direction of the Assembler!
Chinese: 幹得漂亮！按下[ToggleFocus]並從部件列表中選擇*傳送帶*，將它們放置到我標記的位置。別忘了使用[RotateLeft]和[RotateRight]按鈕旋轉傳送帶，讓它們把食材送往組合機的方向！

English (United States): Good job! Now press the *Esc* or the *Delete key* or the *RMB* to stop placing *Conveyor Belts*.
Chinese: 幹得好！接下來按下*Esc*或*Delete鍵*或*鼠標右鍵*，取消放置*傳送帶*。

English (United States): Good job! Now press [Cancel] to stop placing *Conveyor Belts*.
Chinese: 幹得好！接下來按[Cancel]取消放置*傳送帶*。

English (United States): Conveyor Belts cannot directly feed into a Grill or an Assembler, so we will need to use robotics to handle the transitions between these machines. Click on the *Robotic Arm (Dumb)* in the Parts List, and place them in the locations I’ve marked.
Chinese: 傳送帶不能直接將材料送入烤架或組合機，所以我們需要使用機器人完成這些機器之間的銜接。在部件列表中點擊*機械臂（非智能）*，然後將它們放到我標記的位置。

English (United States): Conveyor Belts cannot directly feed into a Grill or an Assembler, so we will need to use robotics to handle the transitions between these machines. Select the *Robotic Arm (Dumb)* in the Parts List, and place them in the locations I’ve marked.
Chinese: 傳送帶不能直接將材料送入烤架或組合機，所以我們需要使用機器人完成這些機器之間的銜接。在部件列表中選擇*機械臂（非智能）*，然後將它們放到我標記的位置。

English (United States): We need to pick up Cooked Patties from the Grill, and place them into the Assembler. Robotic Arms (Dumb) will pick up anything, so they will pick up a raw patty as soon as it is placed in front of them. Instead, we need to use a *Robotic Arm (Smart)* so that we can configure it to only pick up *Cooked Patties*…
Chinese: 我們需要從烤架上拾取做熟的肉餅，並將它們放到組合機裡。機械臂（非智能）碰到什麼物品都會拿起來，所以如果使用非智能機械臂，生肉餅一放入烤架就會被立刻取出。所以，我們需要使用*機械臂（智能）*，將其設置為只拾取*熟肉餅*...

English (United States): That *Robotic Arm (Smart)* isn’t as intelligent as us Human Beings! So it needs to be told exactly what ingredient to pick up. Right click on it, then select *Cooked Patties* in the ingredient drop-down.
Chinese: 那台*機械臂（智能）*的智力可比不上我們人類！所以，我們必須明確告訴它要拾取什麼東西。右鍵點擊機械臂，然後在食材下拉菜單中選擇*熟肉餅*。

English (United States): That *Robotic Arm (Smart)* isn’t as intelligent as us Human Beings! So it needs to be told exactly what ingredient to pick up. Highlight it, press [ConfigurePart] to open its setting, then select *Cooked Patties* in the ingredient drop-down.
Chinese: 那台*機械臂（智能）*的智力可比不上我們人類！所以，我們必須明確告訴它要拾取什麼東西。高亮選擇它，按下[ConfigurePart]打開設置，然後在食材下拉菜單中選擇*熟肉餅*。

English (United States): Now we can make a small test run of our kitchen! Let’s see how everything works out!
Chinese: 接下來，就可以對我們的廚房進行小規模測試運行啦！看看是不是一切順利吧！

English (United States): Click on the *START* button to set the kitchen running.
Chinese: 點擊*開始*按鈕，即可令廚房開始運轉。

English (United States): Press [StartSimulation] to set the kitchen running.

Chinese: 那麼...就來看看效果到底如何吧！

English (United States): Congratulations! You’ve helped me achieve the first step in my plan for global dominance!... By which I of course mean dominance of the fast food market!...
Chinese: 恭喜！你幫我完成了稱霸全球的第一步！...當然，我說的是稱霸全球快餐市場！...

English (United States): Next, we’re going to look into making our machines more efficient! Join me again when you’re ready!
Chinese: 接下來，我們看一看能不能讓機器變得更有效率！準備好了就來找我吧！

English (United States): Welcome again, my dear human partner! As you probably know, sometimes things don't go as planned.
Chinese: 又見面了，我親愛的人類搭檔！你大概也知道，有的時候，事情並不會像計劃中那麼順利。

English (United States): Sometimes ingredients get stuck, sometimes an intelligence agency starts following you, sometimes things catch on fire...
Chinese: 有的時候食材會卡住，有的時候情報機構會開始跟蹤你，有的時候機器會着火...

English (United States): That last thing is what brings us here today! I will show you a couple of handy tricks to keep those pesky fires at bay!
Chinese: 而今天，我們就要學習這最後一件事！我要給你演示一些方便的方法，可以撲滅這些煩人的火情！

English (United States): This is a poorly designed kitchen, as you will see soon, it has a couple of design flaws...
Chinese: 這是一處設計很糟糕的廚房。你過一會兒就會發現，它有不少設計缺陷...

English (United States): I will start the machines to show you what I mean...
Chinese: 等我啟動機器，你就明白我是什麼意思了...

English (United States): See? A fire broke out because ingredients stood still on the *Conveyor Grill* for too long.
Chinese: 看到沒？因為食材在*傳送帶烤架*上呆得太久，發生了火災。

English (United States): The same thing will happen to other machines, such as regular *Grills* and *Fryers*. If you let the fire burn for too long, all ingredients will be ruined!
Chinese: 同樣的情況也會發生在其他機器上，比如普通的*烤架*與*油炸機*。如果着火之後太久不管，所有的食材都會被一起毀掉！

English (United States): And if you're a lazy human and let it burn even longer, nearby machines might catch fire as well... And we don't want that to happen, do we? Innocent machines might get hurt!
Chinese: 如果你是個懶惰的人類，放任火情繼續發展，附近的機器可能也會着火...這可不妙，你說呢？搞不好會有無辜的機器受傷呢！

English (United States): Let's start by placing a *Firefighter Robotic Arm* in this position, so we can extinguish the fire when it happens! Don't worry about the direction it's facing, it will be able to extinguish any fire in its radius.
Chinese: 我們先在這裡放一個*滅火機械臂*，這樣火災發生的時候就能滅火啦！不用擔心它朝向哪個方向，只要是處於效果範圍內的火災，它都能處理。
好極了！就來看看它的效果吧！

English (United States): The fire has started! Now watch as the *Firefighter Robotic Arm* automatically responds to the fires.
Chinese: 着火了！接下來，好好看着*滅火機械臂*自動作出反應吧。

English (United States): Perfect! It seems that the fire has been contained, good job!
Chinese: 完美！看來火情已經控制住了，幹得漂亮！

English (United States): Well... You simply stood there and did nothing but I guess the fire was extinguished anyway...
Chinese: 唔...你光是幹站着，不過火好像還是滅掉了...

English (United States): But I have a feeling that we can do better... Maybe we could modify the kitchen so the fire never starts in the first place.
Chinese: 但我感覺好像還可以進一步改進...沒准可以調整廚房，徹底消除火災隱患。

English (United States): Right click on the *Order Reader* to open the properties window.
Chinese: 右鍵點擊*訂單讀取器*打開屬性窗口。

English (United States): Highlight the *Order Reader* and pres [ConfigurePart] to open the Properties Window.
Chinese: 高亮選擇*訂單讀取器*，按下[ConfigurePart]打開屬性窗口。

English (United States): Click on the *+ NEW CONNECTION TO PART* button...
Chinese: 點擊*+ 新建部件連接*按鈕...

English (United States): Select the *+ NEW CONNECTION TO PART* button...
Chinese: 選擇*+ 新建部件連接*按鈕...

English (United States): Now select the the *Raw Patties* *Dispenser* to connect it.
Chinese: 接下來選擇*生肉餅**分配器*進行連接

English (United States): Highlight the *Raw Patties* *Dispenser*, and press [SelectPart] to connect it.
Chinese: 高亮選擇選擇*生肉餅**分配器*，然後按下[SelectPart]進行連接。

English (United States): Select *Do Nothing* to expand the options, then configure the options so that *Perform action 1 times on New Order* is set.
Chinese: 選擇*閒置*展開選項，然後將選項設置為*收到新訂單時進行1次行動*。

English (United States): Select *Do Nothing* to expand the options, then scroll the options so that *Perform action 1 times on New Order* is set.
Chinese: 選擇*閒置*展開選項，然後滾動選項，將其設置為*收到新訂單時進行1次行動*。

English (United States): This will help us make sure the *Conveyor Grill* doesn't get more *Raw Patties* than strictly required.
Chinese: 這樣就可以確保*傳送帶烤架*不會收到比需要數量更多的*生肉餅*。

English (United States): Now close the *Order Reader* properties window.
Chinese: 接下來關閉*訂單讀取器*屬性窗口。

English (United States): Now select *OK* to close the settings panel and save your changes.
Chinese: 現在，選擇*確定*關閉設置面板，保存更改。

English (United States): Click on the *START* button to see how our little contraption works!
Chinese: 點擊*開始*按鈕，看看裝置的運行情況吧！

English (United States): Press [StartSimulation] to see how our little contraption works!
Chinese: 按下[StartSimulation]，看看我們這小小裝置的運行情況吧！
好極了！就來看看效果到底如何吧！

English (United States): Amazing! We've managed to avoid the fire entirely! Remember, avoiding a disaster entirely is better than responding to disasters that are already happening!
Chinese: 棒極了！我們完全避免了火災的發生！記住，防患於未然總比事後救災好得多！

English (United States): See you again soon minion!... Friend! I meant *friend*!
Chinese: 回頭見了，奴隸！...朋友！我想說的是*朋友*！

English (United States): Hello again, my dear human partner! Please, come in...
Chinese: 又見面了，我親愛的人類搭檔！快請進……

English (United States): I was just doing regular human stuff like breathing oxygen and listening to the wireless...
Chinese: 我正在做人類常做的事，比如呼吸氧氣和聽取無線電波...

English (United States): Definitely not doing silly non-human things like coming up with a plan to take over the world, hehehe!
Chinese: 絕對不是在做什麼愚蠢的非人類事情，比如計劃統治世界什麼的，哈哈哈！

English (United States): Anyway, I wanted to teach you a few things about liquid ingredients today.
Chinese: 總之，我今天要教你一些關於液體食材的事。

English (United States): Some complex meals will require liquid condiments, such as ketchup or mustard.
Chinese: 有一些複雜的菜肴需要液體調料，比如番茄醬或芥末。

English (United States): Right now I have this assembly line capable of producing *Cheesy Dogs*, which are just like regular hot dogs but with cheese on top.
Chinese: 目前我搞來了一個組裝線，可以製作*奶酪熱狗*，和普通熱狗差不多，不過上面放了奶酪。

English (United States): What I want to do is to change it so it will produce *Ultimate Dogs*... Those are pretty much the same but adding *Ketchup* and *Mustard*.
Chinese: 我想要做的，是把它改裝一下，讓它生產*至尊熱狗*...基本上也沒什麼區別，不過要加上*番茄醬*和*芥末*。

English (United States): The first step is to replace this regular *Assembler* with an *Advanced Assembler*.
Chinese: 第一步是用*高級組合機*替換掉這台普通的*組合機*。

English (United States): Only *Advanced Assemblers* are capable of producing dishes that require liquid ingredients.
Chinese: 只有*高級組合機*可以生產需要液體食材的菜肴。

English (United States): So, *Left Click* on the *Assembler* to select it and then use the *{PartDelete}* key in order to remove it.
Chinese: 所以，*左鍵點擊**組合機*將其選中，然後使用*{PartDelete}*將其移除。

English (United States): So, highlight the *Assembler* then hold [Cancel] in order to remove it.
Chinese: 接下來，高亮選擇*組合機*，然後按住[Cancel]將其移除。

English (United States): Now place an *Advanced Assembler* in the spot I've highlighted.
Chinese: 接下來在高亮顯示的位置放一台*高級組合機*。

English (United States): Right click the *Advanced Assembler* and configure it to produce *Ultimate Dogs*.
Chinese: 右鍵單擊*高級組合機*，將其設置為生產*至尊熱狗*。

English (United States): Highlight the *Advanced Assembler*, press [ConfigurePart] then configure it to produce *Ultimate Dogs*.
Chinese: 高亮選擇*高級組合機*，按下[ConfigurePart]將其設置為生產*至尊熱狗*。

English (United States): Now close the machine settings panel for the Advanced Assembler.
Chinese: 然後，關閉高級組合機的機器設置面板。

English (United States): Now select *OK* to close the Properties Window for the Advanced Assembler.
Chinese: 接下來，選擇*確定*關閉高級組合機的屬性窗口。

English (United States): Now we only need to set up a couple of machines in order to supply the *Ketchup* and *Mustard* needed to assemble the dish.
Chinese: 接下來，只需要再設置幾台機器，提供組合菜肴所需的*番茄醬*和*芥末*就好了。

English (United States): Liquid ingredients come from *Storage Tanks* and need to be pumped in order to reach the place where you need them.
Chinese: 液體食材來自*儲罐*，需要使用泵機，才能把它們運到該去的地方。

English (United States): So, in order to move them around we're also going to need a *Pump*.
Chinese: 所以說，為了移動食材，我們還需要一台*泵機*。

English (United States): Select the *Storage Tank* in the parts list, then place *Two* of them in the locations I will mark on the floor.
Chinese: 在部件列表中選擇*儲罐*，然後在地板上的標記位置放置*兩個*。

English (United States): Select the *Pump* in the parts list, and place *Two* of them in the locations I will mark on the floor.
Chinese: 在部件列表中選擇*泵機*，然後在地板上的標記位置放置*兩個*。

English (United States): Fantastic! Now let's configure this *Storage Tank* so its initial contents are set to *Ketchup*.
Chinese: 好極了！接下來對這個*儲罐*進行設置，把它的初始內容設置為*番茄醬*。

English (United States): Now close the machine settings panel for the Storage Tank.
Chinese: 然後，關閉儲罐的機器設置面板。

English (United States): Now select *OK* close the Properties Window for the Storage Tank.
Chinese: 接下來，選擇*確定*關閉儲罐的屬性窗口。

English (United States): Perfect! Do the same thing for the other *Storage Tank* but this time setting it to *Mustard*.
Chinese: 完美！另外一個*儲罐*也是類似的設置，不過要設置成*芥末*。

English (United States): Now we have to set up the pipes in order to transport the liquids. First, right click on this *Pump* in order to open the properties window.
Chinese: 接下來，我們要設置管道，才能運輸液體。首先，右鍵點擊這個*泵機*，打開屬性窗口。

English (United States): Now we have to set up the pipes in order to transport the liquids. First, highlight this *Pump* then press [ConfigurePart] to open the properties window.
Chinese: 接下來，我們要設置管道，用來運輸液體。首先，高亮選擇這個*泵機*，並按下[ConfigurePart]打開屬性窗口。

English (United States): Then click on the *+ NEW CONNECTION TO PART* button.
Chinese: 然後，點擊*+ 新建部件連接*按鈕。

English (United States): Then select the *+ NEW CONNECTION TO PART* button.
Chinese: 然後選擇*+ 新建部件連接*按鈕。

English (United States): Perfect! Now click on the pipe connection port on the *Storage Tank* containing the *Ketchup*.
Chinese: 完美！接下來，點擊裝有*番茄醬*的*儲罐*的管道連接口。

English (United States): Perfect! Now highlight the *Storage Tank* containing the *Ketchup* and press [SelectPart].
Chinese: 完美！接下來，高亮選擇裝有*番茄醬*的*儲罐*，然後按下[SelectPart]。

English (United States): We now need to connect the *Pump* to the *Advanced Assembler*. Once again, click on the *+ NEW CONNECTION TO PART* button.
Chinese: 接下來，需要將*泵機*與*高級組合機*連接到一起。再次點擊*+ 新建部件連接*按鈕。

English (United States): We now need to connect the *Pump* to the *Advanced Assembler*. Once again, select the *+ NEW CONNECTION TO PART* button.
Chinese: 接下來，我們需要將*泵機*與*高級組合機*連接到一起。這次也一樣，選擇*+ 新建部件連接*按鈕。

English (United States): And now click on one of the two free pipe connection ports on the *Advanced Assembler*.
Chinese: 接下來點擊*高級組合機*上兩個空閒的管道連接口之一。

English (United States): And highlight the *Advanced Assembler* and press [SelectPart].
Chinese: 高亮選擇*高級組合機*，並按下[SelectPart]。

English (United States): Now close the properties window for the *Pump*.
Chinese: 接下來關閉*泵機*的屬性窗口。

English (United States): Now select *OK* to close the Properties Window for the *Pump*.
Chinese: 接下來，選擇*確定*關閉*泵機*的屬性窗口。

English (United States): We need to do the same for the *Mustard* now. Right click on this *Pump* in order to open the properties window.
Chinese: 我們需要也對*芥末*進行相同的設置。右鍵點擊這個*泵機*，打開屬性窗口。

English (United States): We need to do the same for the *Mustard* now. Highlight this *Pump* and press [ConfigurePart] to open the properties window.
Chinese: 我們需要也對*芥末*進行相同的設置。高亮選擇這個*泵機*，按下[ConfigurePart]打開屬性窗口。

English (United States): Then click on the *+ NEW CONNECTION TO PART* button.
Chinese: 然後，點擊*+ 新建部件連接*按鈕。

English (United States): Select the *+ NEW CONNECTION TO PART* button.
Chinese: 選擇*+ 新建部件連接*按鈕。

English (United States): Click on the pipe connection port on the *Storage Tank* containing the *Mustard*.
Chinese: 點擊裝有*芥末*的*儲罐*的管道連接口。

English (United States): Highlight the *Storage Tank* containing the *Mustard* and press [SelectPart] to make the connection.
Chinese: 高亮選擇裝有*芥末*的*儲罐*，然後按下[SelectPart]進行連接。

English (United States): We now need to connect the *Pump* to the *Advanced Assembler*. Once again, click on the *+ NEW CONNECTION TO PART* button.
Chinese: 接下來，需要將*泵機*與*高級組合機*連接到一起。再次點擊*+ 新建部件連接*按鈕。

English (United States): We now need to connect the *Pump* to the *Advanced Assembler*. Once again, select the *+ NEW CONNECTION TO PART* button.
Chinese: 接下來，我們需要將*泵機*與*高級組合機*連接到一起。這次也一樣，選擇*+ 新建部件連接*按鈕。

English (United States): And now click on the free pipe connection port on the *Advanced Assembler*.
Chinese: 接下來點擊*高級組合機*上空閒的管道連接口。

English (United States): And now highlight the *Advanced Assembler* and press [SelectPart] to make the connection.
Chinese: 接下來，高亮選擇*高級組合機*，並按下[SelectPart]進行連接。

English (United States): Now close the properties window for the *Pump*.
Chinese: 接下來關閉*泵機*的屬性窗口。

English (United States): Now select *OK* to close the Properties Window for the *Pump*.
Chinese: 接下來，選擇*確定*關閉*泵機*的屬性窗口。

English (United States): Click on the *START* button to see how our little contraption works!
Chinese: 點擊*開始*按鈕，看看裝置的運行情況吧！

English (United States): Press [StartSimulation] to see how our little contraption works!
Chinese: 按下[StartSimulation]，看看我們這小小裝置的運行情況吧！
好極了！就來看看效果到底如何吧！

English (United States): Great job! Together we'll rule the world... of fast-food!
Chinese: 幹得漂亮！很快我們就會統治世界...快餐的世界！

English (United States): Ah, you’re back! I was just converting oxygen into carbon dioxide, as we like to do! Don’t we, friend?
Chinese: 啊，你回來了！我正在將氧氣轉化為二氧化碳，人類都這樣的！你說是不是，朋友？

English (United States): It’s time to learn about how we can make our kitchens more efficient, so we don’t waste ingredients or energy!
Chinese: 是時候學習一下如何避免食材與電力浪費，讓我們的廚房變得更有效率了！

English (United States): But first, I need you to finish this kitchen layout. Currently it’s layout is suited for *Plain Burgers*, but I need it to produce *Cheeseburgers*
Chinese: 不過，首先我需要你完成這個廚房的佈局。目前的佈局是給*簡單漢堡*用的，不過我需要它生產的是*奶酪漢堡*。

English (United States): It’s always a good idea to look at the recipe first! Let’s see what ingredients are needed, so we know what machines to place. Click on the *Recipe* button to view the *Cheeseburger* recipe.
Chinese: 先看看食譜總不是什麼壞主意！先看看需要什麼食材，才好確定需要放置什麼機器。點擊*食譜按鈕*，查看*奶酪漢堡*的食譜。

English (United States): It’s always a good idea to look at the recipe first! Let’s see what ingredients are needed, so we know what machines to place. Press [ToggleRecipes] to view the *Cheeseburger* recipe.
Chinese: 先看看食譜總不是什麼壞主意！先看看需要什麼食材，才好確定需要放置什麼機器。按下[ToggleRecipes]，查看*奶酪漢堡*的食譜。

English (United States): This recipe requires *Cheese*, which needs to be *processed* into a *Cheese Slice*… Close the recipe window, and I’ll tell you which machines we will need.
Chinese: 這個食譜需要*奶酪*，而這個食材需要進行*處理*，變成*奶酪片*才能使用...關閉食譜窗口，我來告訴你這個過程需要什麼機器來完成。

English (United States): Wait… this assembler already has two Robot Arms feeding ingredients into it, which is the maximum it can support....
Chinese: 等一下...已經有兩台機械臂在給這個組合機供給食材，不能再多加了...

English (United States): If we are adding Cheese, we will need to transport it to the Assembler on the *same conveyor belts* that the burger buns use.
Chinese: 如果我們要加奶酪的話，就要使用運輸漢堡麵包的*同一條傳送帶*將奶酪運送到組合機。

English (United States): The *Robot Arm (Dumb)* that is currently picking up the Burger Bun will pick up *any* ingredient, so it will be able to place the Cheese Slice into the Assembler too.
Chinese: 當前負責拾取漢堡麵包的*機械臂（非智能）*是*不管什麼*食材都會拾取的，所以也可以把奶酪片放到組合機裡。

English (United States): Click on the *Dispenser* in the Parts list, and place it in the marked location. Rotate it using the *{PartRotateLeft}* and *{PartRotateRight}* keys so that it is facing towards the Assembler.
Chinese: 在部件列表中點擊*分配器*，然後將其放置在標記的地點。你可以用*{PartRotateLeft}*和*{PartRotateRight}*鍵旋轉部件讓它面對組合機。

English (United States): Press [ToggleFocus] and select the *Dispenser* in the Parts list, and place it in the marked location. Rotate it using the [RotateLeft] and [RotateRight] buttons so that it is facing towards the Assembler.
Chinese: 按下[ToggleFocus]在部件列表中選擇*分配器*，然後將其放置在標記的地點。你可以用[RotateLeft]和[RotateRight]按鈕旋轉部件，讓它面對組合機。

English (United States): *Right click* on the new Dispenser and configure it to dispense *Cheese*.
Chinese: *右鍵點擊*新的分配器，將其設置為分配*奶酪*。

English (United States): *Right click* on the new Dispenser and configure it to dispense *Cheese*.
Chinese: *右鍵點擊*新的分配器，將其設置為分配*奶酪*。

English (United States): Highlight the new Dispenser and press [ConfigurePart] to view its Properties Window. Configure it to dispense *Cheese*.
Chinese: 高亮選擇新的分配器，按下[ConfigurePart]查看其屬性窗口，並將其設置為分配*奶酪*。

English (United States): Now we need a *Food Processor* to turn the *Cheese* into a *Cheese Slice*. Click on the *Food Processor* in the Parts List, and place it in the marked location, facing the Assembler.
Chinese: 接下來，我們需要一台*食品處理機*將*奶酪*變成*奶酪片*。在部件列表中點擊*食品處理機*，將其朝向組合機的方向，放置在標記的位置。

English (United States): Now we need a *Food Processor* to turn the *Cheese* into a *Cheese Slice*. Press [ToggleFocus] then select the *Food Processor* in the Parts List, and place it in the marked location, facing the Assembler.
Chinese: 接下來，我們需要一台*食品處理機*將*奶酪*變成*奶酪片*。按下[ToggleFocus]在部件列表中點擊*食品處理機*，將其朝向組合機的方向，放置在標記的位置。

English (United States): ...and then set the slider below to 1. This means that whenever a customer orders a *Cheeseburger* the *Order Reader* will command the *Assembler* to produce exactly one.
Chinese: ...然後將下方的滑塊設置至1。這也就是說，當顧客訂購*奶酪漢堡*的時候，*訂單讀取器*就會命令*組合機*生產一個。

English (United States): As an additional measure to use less electricity we'll also connect the *Order Reader* to the *Grill* so it will only be on when a *Cheeseburger* order is pending.
Chinese: 我們還要採取額外的節能措施，將*訂單讀取器*與*烤架*連接在一起，這樣只有在收到*奶酪漢堡*訂單的時候，烤架才會啟動。

English (United States): Click on the *+ NEW CONNECTION TO PART* button and then click on the *Grill* to connect it.
Chinese: 點擊*+ 新建部件連接*按鈕，然後點擊*烤架*進行連接。

English (United States): Select the *+ NEW CONNECTION TO PART* button and then highlight the *Grill* and press [SelectPart] to make a connection.
Chinese: 選擇*+ 新建部件連接*按鈕，然後高亮選擇*烤架*，按下[SelectPart]進行連接。

English (United States): The Food Processor requires no additional set up, it will automatically process any ingredient that passes through it. Some more advanced dishes will require ingredients to be processed multiple times.
Chinese: 食品處理機不需要進行額外設置，它會自動對收到的食材進行處理。有些高級的菜肴會需要經過多次處理的食材。

English (United States): Now we just need to reconfigure the Assembler! *Right Click* on the Assembler, and select *Cheeseburger* in the Recipe drop-down.
Chinese: 接下來，我們只要重新設置組合機就可以啦！*右鍵點擊*組合機，然後從下拉選單中選擇*奶酪漢堡*。

English (United States): Now we just need to reconfigure the Assembler! Highlight the Assembler, press [ConfigurePart] to open its Properties Window and select *Cheeseburger* in the Recipe drop-down.
Chinese: 接下來，我們只要重新設置組合機就可以啦！高亮選擇組合機，按下[ConfigurePart]打開屬性窗口，然後從食譜下拉列表中選擇*奶酪漢堡*。

English (United States): Click on the *+ NEW CONNECTION TO PART* button and then click on the *Dispenser* to connect it.
Chinese: 點擊*+ 新建部件連接*按鈕，然後點擊*分配器*進行連接。

English (United States): Select the *+ NEW CONNECTION TO PART* button, then highlight the *Dispenser* and press [SelectPart] to connect it.
Chinese: 選擇*+ 新建部件連接*按鈕，然後高亮選擇*分配器*，按下[SelectPart]進行連接。

English (United States): Now to run the kitchen and check everything works! Press the *START* button to begin...
Chinese: 接下來，讓廚房運行一下，看看一切是否順利吧！按下*開始*按鈕就可以開始了...

English (United States): Now to run the kitchen and check everything works! Press [StartSimulation] to begin...
Chinese: 接下來，讓廚房運行一下，看看一切是否順利吧！按下[StartSimulation]即可開始...

English (United States): ...and then set the slider to 1. This guarantees that we'll only dispense one *Raw Patty* for every *Cheeseburger* order we receive.
Chinese: ...然後把滑塊設置成1。這樣一來，就能確保我們每收到一個*奶酪漢堡*的訂單，只會分配出一份*生肉餅*。

English (United States): This kitchen has a flaw, it will endlessly produce Cheeseburgers! What a waste of ingredients and, more importantly, electricity! Misuse of electrons makes me feel sad and angry…
Chinese: 這個廚房有一個重大缺陷，它會生產無窮無盡的奶酪漢堡！不僅浪費食材，而且更重要的是，還浪費電！胡亂使用電子，總是讓我悲憤不已...

English (United States): Ingredients are constantly being dispensed, and the grill is always on, even if no one has ordered a Cheeseburger! That cannot be allowed!
Chinese: 就算根本沒有人點奶酪漢堡，機器也一直在分配食材，烤架也是一直開着！這可不能忍！

English (United States): We can fix this by placing an *Order Reader*, to ensure Cheeseburgers are prepared only when an order comes through. Select the *Order Reader* in the Parts list, and place it in the location I’ve highlighted.
Chinese: 我們可以放一個*訂單讀取器*進行修復，確保只有在收到訂單時才準備奶酪漢堡。在部件列表中選擇*訂單讀取器*，然後將它放到高亮顯示的位置。

English (United States): We can fix this by placing an *Order Reader*, to ensure Cheeseburgers are prepared only when an order comes through. Select the *Order Reader* in the Parts list, and place it in the location I’ve highlighted.
Chinese: 我們可以放一個*訂單讀取器*來解決這個問題，確保只有在收到訂單時才準備奶酪漢堡。在部件列表中選擇*訂單讀取器*，然後將它放到高亮顯示的位置。
好極了！就來看看效果到底如何吧！

English (United States): *Right Click* on the Order Reader, and set it to detect *Cheeseburger* orders.
Chinese: *右鍵點擊*訂單讀取器，然後將其設置為檢測*奶酪漢堡*訂單。

English (United States): Highlight the Order Reader and press [ConfigurePart] to open its Properties Window, and set it to detect *Cheeseburger* orders.
Chinese: 高亮選擇訂單讀取器，按下[ConfigurePart]打開其屬性窗口，然後將其設置為檢測*奶酪漢堡*訂單。

English (United States): Now that the order reader will detect whenever a cheeseburger order is placed, we can use it to control up to four other machines.
Chinese: 既然訂單讀取器已經設置為檢測是否有奶酪漢堡的訂單，我們還可以用它控制四台其他機器。

English (United States): We are wasting ingredients currently, so we will use the order reader to instruct the dispensers to dispense a single ingredient each, only when a new order arrives.
Chinese: 我們現在正在浪費大量食材，所以要使用訂單讀取器對分配器下達指令，只有在收到新訂單的時候才把每種食材分配一份。

English (United States): And that grill is constantly on, wasting electricity... so we can control it to only be on whilst an order is pending!
Chinese: 還有，那烤架一直處於開啟狀態，簡直浪費電力...所以，我們可以對它進行控制，只有在訂單進行的時候才啟動！

English (United States): Now select *+ NEW CONNECTION TO PART*.
Chinese: 接下來選擇*+ 新建部件連接*。

English (United States): Now select *+ NEW CONNECTION TO PART*.
Chinese: 接下來選擇*+ 新建部件連接*。

English (United States): *Left Click* on the *Cheese Dispenser* to create a connection to that part.
Chinese: *左鍵點擊**奶酪分配器*，將其與部件連接。

English (United States): Highlight the *Cheese Dispenser* and press [SelectPart] to create a connection to that part.
Chinese: 高亮選擇*奶酪分配器*，按下[SelectPart]將其與部件連接

English (United States): Excellent! Now select *+ NEW CONNECTION TO PART* again
Chinese: 好極了！接下來再次選擇*+ 新建部件連接*。

English (United States): *Left Click* on the *Raw Patty Dispenser* to create a connection to that part.
Chinese: *左鍵點擊**生肉餅分配器*，將其與部件連接。

English (United States): Highlight the *Raw Patty Dispenser* and press [SelectPart] to create a connection to that part.
Chinese: 高亮選擇*生肉餅分配器*，按下[SelectPart]將其與部件連接

English (United States): Select *Do Nothing* to expand the control options, then scroll the options so *Perform action 1 time on new order* is set.
Chinese: 選擇*閒置*展開控制選項，然後將選項設置為*收到新訂單時進行1次行動*。

English (United States): One last Dispenser to connect to! select *+ NEW CONNECTION TO PART* again.
Chinese: 就剩最後一台分配器要設置了！再次選擇*+ 新建部件連接*。

English (United States): *Left* Clickon the *Burger Bun Dispenser* to create a connection to that part
Chinese: *左鍵*點擊*漢堡麵包分配器*，將其與部件連接。

English (United States): Highlight the *Burger Bun Dispenser* and press [SelectPart] to create a connection to that part.
Chinese: 高亮選擇*漢堡麵包分配器*，按下[SelectPart]將其與部件連接

English (United States): Select *Do Nothing* to expand the control options, then... you guessed it! Scroll the options so *Perform action 1 time on new order* is set.
Chinese: 選擇*閒置*展開控制選項，然後...猜得沒錯！將選項設置為*收到新訂單時進行1次行動*。

English (United States): Finally, let's control that Grill. Select *+ NEW CONNECTION TO PART*.
Chinese: 最後，設置對烤架的控制。選擇*+ 新建部件連接*。

English (United States): *Left Click* on the *Grill* to create a connection to that part
Chinese: *左鍵點擊**烤架*，將其與部件連接。

English (United States): Highlight the *Grill* then press [SelectPart] to create a connection to that part.
Chinese: 高亮選擇*烤架*，按下[SelectPart]將其與部件連接

English (United States): Select *Do Nothing* to expand the control options, then scroll the options so *On while order is pending* is set.
Chinese: 選擇*閒置*展開控制選項，然後將選項設置為*僅在訂單待處理時啟動*。

English (United States): Great work! Now let’s see what happens, press *START* to begin...
Chinese: 幹得好！接下來看看效果如何。按*開始*即可開始測試...

English (United States): Great work! Now let’s see what happens, press [StartSimulation] to begin...
Chinese: 幹得好！接下來看看效果如何。按[StartSimulation]開始...

English (United States): On the left there are where customer orders will appear. I’ll simulate some customer orders. ‘Simulate’... makes me sound almost like a machine?! How humourous!
Chinese: 顧客的訂單會出現在左側。我來模擬一些顧客訂單。''模擬''...會不會讓我聽起來很像機器人？！真是太幽默啦！

English (United States): Perfect! We’ve vastly improved the efficiency of our Kitchen, I knew you were the person for the job! I think it’s time to start on our first premises, the world won’t know what is about to UNFOLD! HAHA! Erm… yes, let’s open our first restaurant then, shall we?
Chinese: 完美！我們已經大大提升了廚房的效率，我就知道找你准沒錯！是時候開始我們的第一處場地了，全世界都不知道，馬上就要出大事啦！哈哈！呃...沒錯，我們就來開第一家餐館吧，嗯？

English (United States): Welcome again, my dear partner! Today I'm going to show you a couple of tricks to reduce power usage in our kitchens.
Chinese: 又見面了，我親愛的搭檔！今天，我要教你幾個小技巧，降低廚房的電力消耗。

English (United States): I’ve got my eye on a premises by the beach which has old power lines, and we will cause a blackout if we use too much electricity!
Chinese: 我看上了一處電網老舊的沙灘場地，如果使用電能太多，就會造成停電！

English (United States): The good news is that with some clever ideas you can usually get around those limitations! Let's get our carbon-based brains working!
Chinese: 好消息是，要是有好的點子，應該就可以繞過這些限制！我們快來開動我們碳基生物的大腦吧！

English (United States): The kitchen you see right now will most likely cause a blackout once both *Assemblers* start working at the same time, let me show you!
Chinese: 你現在看到的這個廚房，一旦兩台*組合機*同時啟動，就很可能造成停電。我來給你展示一下吧！

English (United States): I will start the machines to show you what I mean...
Chinese: 等我啟動機器，你就明白我是什麼意思了...

English (United States): See? That peak in electricity usage caused a blackout and our restaurant cannot continue working!
Chinese: 看到沒？電力使用的峰值導致了停電，我們的餐館也沒辦法繼續運作了！

English (United States): First of all, I want you to right click on the *Plain Burger* *Assembler* (the Assembler at the top) to open the Properties Window.
Chinese: 首先，我要你右鍵點擊*普通漢堡**組合機*（上方的組合機），打開屬性窗口。

English (United States): First of all, I want you to highlight the *Plain Burger* *Assembler* (the Assembler at the top) and press [ConfigurePart] to open the Properties Window.
Chinese: 首先，我要你高亮選擇*普通漢堡**組合機*（上方的組合機），然後按下[ConfigurePart]打開屬性窗口。

English (United States): Now we can change the Operation Mode to *Power Saving*. That will make this machine use less electricity, but it will also take a longer time to assemble dishes.
Chinese: 接下來，我們可以把操作模式切換為*節能*。這樣一來，機器消耗的電力就會減少，但組合菜肴所需要的時間也會變長。

English (United States): Great, now make the same change to the *Cheeseburger* *Assembler*!
Chinese: 好極了，接下來也對*奶酪漢堡**組合機*應用相同的改動！

English (United States): Now our *Assemblers* use 20% less electricity than before, but they will take 50% longer to assemble the *Burgers*.
Chinese: 這下，我們的*組合機*耗電就比之前降低了20%，但組合*漢堡*所要花費的時間延長了50%。

English (United States): There's something else we can do in order to save electricity. We don't really need two *Grills* here, right? We could have just one!
Chinese: 要節約電力，我們還可以採取其他措施。我們用不上兩個*烤架*的，對吧？只要用一個就可以了！

English (United States): I'm going to remove a few machines for you, and then you can place the new ones... Wait here, human friend!
Chinese: 我要先幫你移除一些機器，然後你再放一些新的...在這裡等一下吧，人類朋友！

English (United States): Now we can start rebuilding the kitchen. First, select the *Dispenser* in the parts list and place it in the highlighted location.
Chinese: 接下來，我們就可以開始重建廚房了。首先，在部件列表中選擇*分配器*，並將其放置在高亮的位置。

English (United States): Open the *Dispenser* Properties Window and configure it to dispense *Raw Patties*.
Chinese: 打開*分配器*的屬性界面，將其設置為分配*生肉餅*。

English (United States): Open the *Dispenser* Properties Window and configure it to dispense *Raw Patties*.
Chinese: 打開*分配器*的屬性界面，將其設置為分配*生肉餅*。

English (United States): The next step is to add a *Robotic Arm (Dumb)* in the highlighted location...
Chinese: 下一步，在高亮顯示的位置添加一台*機械臂（非智能）*...

English (United States): And now add a *Grill* to the highlighted location...
Chinese: 然後再往高亮顯示的位置添加一個*烤架*...

English (United States): And finally place *two* of the *Robotic Arm (Smart)* in the marked locations! Make sure to rotate them so they are facing the right way.
Chinese: 最後，在標記的位置放置*兩台**機械臂（智能）*！不要忘了進行旋轉，讓它們朝向正確的位置。

English (United States): Open the Properties Window for the first *Robotic Arm (Smart)* and configure it to only take *Cooked Patties*...
Chinese: 打開第一台*機械臂（智能）*的屬性窗口，將其設置為僅拾取*熟肉餅*...

English (United States): Open the Properties Window for the first *Robotic Arm (Smart)* and configure it to only take *Cooked Patties*...
Chinese: 打開第一台*機械臂（智能）*的屬性窗口，將其設置為僅拾取*熟肉餅*...

English (United States): Now, set the *Operation Mode* to be *Right*. This means that it will pick up Cooked Patties, and place them to its right side, into the Plain Burger Assembler.
Chinese: 接下來，將*操作模式*設置為*右側*。這也就是說，它會拾取熟肉餅，並將其放置到右邊的普通漢堡組合機中。

English (United States): Now for the other *Robotic Arm (Smart)*.  Configure it to only take *Cooked Patties*...
Chinese: 接下來，設置另一台*機械臂（智能）*。將其設置為僅拾取*熟肉餅*...

English (United States): Now, set the *Operation Mode* to be *Left*. It will pick up Cooked Patties and place them to its left side, into the Cheeseburger Assembler.
Chinese: 然後，將*操作模式*設置為*左側*。這也就是說，它會拾取熟肉餅，並將其放置到左邊的奶酪漢堡組合機中。

English (United States): Click on the *START* button to see how our little contraption works!
Chinese: 點擊*開始*按鈕，看看裝置的運行情況吧！

English (United States): Press the [StartSimulation] button to see how our little contraption works!
Chinese: 按下[StartSimulation]，看看我們這小小裝置的運行情況吧！
好極了！就來看看效果到底如何吧！

English (United States): Amazing! We've managed to avoid all blackouts! We're a great team!
Chinese: 真棒！我們成功避免了停電！真是合作無間啊！

English (United States): Now I can go ahead and put down a deposit on that beach-front premises!
Chinese: 這下，我就可以去給沙灘上那片場地交定金了！
讀取已執行操作的數量

Key: Visual Logic Editor/if new order in

English (United States): copy number of actions performed by
Chinese: 複制操作次數 操作執行者為：

English (United States): Do you want to load the selected game? Your current kitchen layout will be replaced.
Chinese: 是否要加載選擇的遊戲？當前的廚房佈局將被替代。

English (United States): This computer is already connected to that part.
Chinese: 這台電腦已經連接至該部件。

English (United States): This counting machine is already connected to that part.
Chinese: 這台計數器已經連接至該部件。

English (United States): These two machines are already connected.
Chinese: 這兩台機器已經相互連接。

English (United States): This order reader is already connected to that part.
Chinese: 這台訂單讀取器已經連接至該部件。

English (United States): This part is already being controlled by another device.
Chinese: 此部件已被另一台設備控制。

English (United States): There's food with dangerous bacteria in the display case!
Chinese: 展示櫃中有食物帶有危險細菌！

English (United States): Watch the power usage, you're dangerously close to a blackout!
Chinese: 注意電力消耗，你即將造成停電！

English (United States): This bonus level might be too challenging if you haven't played through all the tutorials yet. Are you sure you want to proceed?
Chinese: 如果你尚未完成所有教程，那麼此獎勵關卡可能會太難了。確定要繼續嗎？
有一台機器出現了故障！

English (United States): Are you sure you want to cancel? Any changes made will be lost.
Chinese: 確定要取消嗎？所做的更改將會丟失。

English (United States): Your company cannot accept any more contracts right now. Fulfill or forfeit one first.
Chinese: 你的公司當前無法接受更多合約。請先完成或放棄一個合約。

English (United States): You cannot connect any more parts to this computer.
Chinese: 你已無法將更多部件連接至此電腦。

English (United States): You cannot connect any more parts to this counting machine.
Chinese: 你已無法將更多部件連接至此計數器。

English (United States): You cannot create any more connections from this machine.
Chinese: 你已無法從此機器創建更多連接。

English (United States): You cannot connect any more pipes to this part.
Chinese: 你已無法將更多管道連接至此部件。

English (United States): You cannot connect any more parts to this order reader.
Chinese: 你已無法將更多部件連接至此訂單讀取器。

English (United States): You cannot connect any more parts to this repeater.
Chinese: 你已無法將更多部件連接至此中繼器。

English (United States): The controller has been disconnected. Please reconnect the controller, or quit to the main menu where the control method can be changed. If you quit to the main menu, any unsaved data will be lost.
Chinese: 控制器已斷開。請重新連接控制器，或返回主菜單更改控制方式。返回主菜單時，所有未保存的數據都將丟失。

English (United States): A craze for {[DISH]} is about to start!
Are you sure you want to delete this blueprint? This action cannot be undone!
Chinese: 確定要刪除此藍圖嗎？此操作不可撤銷！

English (United States): Do you want to delete that saved game? This action cannot be undone!
Chinese: 是否要刪除此遊戲存檔？此操作無法撤銷！

English (United States): A dish has just been contaminated with dangerous bacteria!
Chinese: 一道菜肴已被危險細菌感染！

English (United States): Cannot alter the way this part works as it is a fixed part of the kitchen.
Chinese: 由於此部件是廚房的固定部件，因此無法對其運行方式進行更改。

English (United States): A Food Critic is about to place an order! Be ready!
Chinese: 一位美食評論家即將點餐！做好準備！

English (United States): Are you sure you want to forfeit this contract? You will lose any advance payment you have received and your company's reputation will be damaged!
Chinese: 確定要放棄此合約嗎？你不僅會失去之前收到的定金，還會損害到公司的聲望！
你超過了食材數量配額！

English (United States): There are no free saved game slots to start a new game. Please delete an old saved game first.
Chinese: 當前沒有空閒的遊戲存檔欄位，無法開始新遊戲。請先刪除一個以前的遊戲存檔。

English (United States): Your company does not have enough funds to research this machine.
Chinese: 公司資金不足，無法研究此機器。

English (United States): An order is about to expire!
You are over budget! Remove some machines to continue.
Chinese: 你已超出預算！移除一些機器方可繼續。

English (United States): There is already a blueprint with that name. Would you like to overwrite it?
Chinese: 已存在具有相同名稱的藍圖。是否要將其覆蓋？

English (United States): Do you want to overwrite that saved game?
Chinese: 是否確定要覆蓋此遊戲存檔？

English (United States): That pipe connection port is already in use.
Are you sure you want to quit?
Are you sure you want to quit? Any unsaved progress will be lost.
Chinese: 確定要退出嗎？未保存的進度將會丟失。

English (United States): Are you sure you want to reset the kitchen to its initial state? This action cannot be undone!
Chinese: 確定要將廚房恢復至初始狀態嗎？此操作不可撤銷！

English (United States): Would you like to save your kitchen layout before returning to the main menu?
Chinese: 要在返回主菜單前保存廚房佈局嗎？

English (United States): There's spoiled food in the display case!
Chinese: 展示櫃中有變質的食物！

English (United States): There are errors that need to be fixed.
There are errors in the Code Editor. If you continue with closing the programmable computer, you will lose your changes.
Chinese: 代碼編輯器中存在錯誤。如果繼續關閉可編程電腦，將會丟失所做的更改。

English (United States): This code is not compatible with the visual logic editor. Sorry!
Chinese: 抱歉，此代碼與視覺邏輯編輯器不兼容！

English (United States): The visual logic editor can only be used for the main code page.
Chinese: 視覺邏輯編輯器僅可用於主代碼頁面。

English (United States): There is a syntax error that needs to be fixed before changing to the visual logic editor.
Chinese: 更換為視覺邏輯編輯器之前，需要先修復一處語法錯誤。

English (United States): You cannot add this command, as it would cause the compiled code to exceed the 32 lines of code limitation.
Chinese: 由於此命令會導致編譯後的代碼超過32行限制，你無法添加此命令。

English (United States): The programmable computer has too many instructions. If you continue with closing the programmable computer, you will lose your changes.
Chinese: 可編程電腦中指令過多。如果繼續關閉可編程電腦，將會丟失所做的更改。
